b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae!\n\nIsang pagpupugay sa mga kababaihan sa kanilang angking galing, talino, sipag, at dedikasyon sa pag-angat ng ating komunidad.\n \nHappy Women\xe2\x80\x99s Day mula sa OMECO Lady Warriors of Light! \xf0\x9f\x99\x8b\xe2\x80\x8d\xe2\x99\x80\xef\xb8\x8f\xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n#PHILRECAArawNgKababaihan2024\n#NationalWomensMonth2024\n#OMECO'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 & \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0 | Ginawaran ng Bureau of Internal Revenue (BIR) RDO 37 Occidental Mindoro ang OMECO bilang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb-\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf ng ating lalawigan. \n\nAng parangal na ito ay tinanggap ng ating Finance Services Department Manager, Richard M. Prado, CPA bilang kinatawan ni GM Celso D. Garcia sa ginanap na 2024 BIR-Tax Campaign Kick-Off sa Magsaysay Hillside Resort.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nPara sa chance na manalo ng mga pa-premyo sa raffle, sundin ang ang mga hakbang na ito kung paano makapag-register online para sa 43rd OMECO Annual General Membership Assembly (AGMA) na gaganapin sa araw ng linggo, 3 Marso 2024, 1:00 P.M. sa OMSC Labangan Main Gymnasium, San Jose.\n\nNarito po ang paraan kung paano mag-register:\n\n1. Sa inyong mobile o computer Browser, i-type ang link na ito:\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89 https://agma.omeco.com.ph\n2. Punan ang hinahanap na \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 ng inyong kuryente . At pindutin ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xe2\x80\x9d.\n3. I-type ang inyong \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 cellphone number.\n4. Pumili kung dadalo sa AGMA ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 o \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98. Kung ikaw ay dadalo ON-SITE, \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2, at \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1.\n5. Basahin ang Amended Ratification of the Articles of Incorporation ng OMECO at bumoto.\n6. I-click ang makikitang box \xe2\x9c\x85 bilang pagsang-ayon sa Data Privacy Policy. At i-click ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xe2\x80\x9d.\n\nPaalala:\n- Magsisimula ang registration online ng \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0.\n- Para sa lahat ng a-attend ng AGMA, magdala ng mga sumusunod:\n1. OMECO Statement of Account o \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\n2. Isang (1) \xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c.\xf0\x9d\x97\x97.\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan, maaaring i-comment sa post na ito.\n\nInaasahan po namin ang inyong partisipasyon sa pagtitipong ito. \n\nMaraming salamat po!'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\n\nNais linawin ng pamunuan ng OMECO na \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 sa 43rd AGMA ng OMECO bukas, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0.\n\nAng AGMA po ay taunang pagtitipon ng mga member-consumer-owners (MCOs) ng OMECO upang maiulat ang kasalukuyang estado ng electric cooperative. Samantala, \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 gayundin para sa deadline ng filling of candidacy.\n\nNarito po ang mga importanteng petsa tungkol sa District Elections:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c & \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 14, 2024; Deadline of filing: APRIL 4, 2024\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc, \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 21, 2024; Deadline of filing: APRIL 11, 2024\n\nPara sa karagdagang impormasyon tungkol sa ELECTION NG BOARD of DIRECTOR, sundan ang link na ito. \n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02nTs5zWSFbhuCxeXVfoVAYFN14T5dLA5U7iUh38kznD9Au6WTzNKsn4wvxnDmw7A6l\n\nMaraming Salamat po. \n\nPlease, share.'
b'Inaanyayahan po ang lahat ng MCOs ng OMECO na dumalo sa 43rd AGMA ng OMECO sa araw ng Linggo, 3 Marso 2024.\n\nMagdala lamang po ng resibo ng inyong kuryente o OMECO Statement of Account na nakapangalan sa inyo at isang (1) VALID I.D.\n\nMain Venue: OMSC Labangan Main Gymnasium, San Jose\nSatellite venues: Sablayan Astrodome, Sablayan at Provincial Training Center, Mamburao'
b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xac (\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94) \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 & \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xad\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6:\n1. Ang raffle \xd0\xb0\xd1\x83 bukas para sa lahat ng member-consumer-owners ng OMECO o mga MCO na nakapangalan sa kanila ang metro ng kuryente.\n2. Ang isang ACCOUNT NUMBER na rehistrado ay katumbas ng isang raffle entry.\n3. Ang GRAND PRIZES ay HINDI convertible sa cash.\n4. Isang beses lang maaaring manalo ang isang consumer. Awtomatikong tatanggalin sa bilang ng raffle entries ang consumer na nanalo na.\n5. Personal na kukunin ng nanalong consumer ang kaniyang premyo sa araw ng AGMA at bibigyan ng 30 segundo para ito ay i-claim. Dapat ipakita ang nakaraang OMECO billing statement o resibo ng kuryente at isang VALID ID.\n6. Ang mga personal na dadalo sa AGMA lamang ang may pagkakataong manalo ng mga raffle grand prizes. Samantala, ang mga nag rehistro ONLINE ay maaaring manalo ng consolation prizes.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80:\n\nOne (1) unit Yamaha Motorcycle\nOne (1) unit Electric Tri-bike\nOne (1) unit Refrigerator\nOne (1) unit 43" Television\nOne (1) unit Automatic Washing Machine\nOne (1) unit Android Tablet\nFour (4) unit Android Cellphone\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80:\nTwo (2) Fifteen Thousand Pesos (P15, 000.00)\nTwo (2) Ten Thousand Pesos (P10, 000.00\nFour (4) Five Thousand Pesos (5, 000.00)\nTen (10) One Thousand Pesos (1, 000.00)\nTwenty-Five (25) Consolation prizes of Five Hundred Pesos Cash (P500.00)\n\nAntabayanan dito sa OMECO IEC Facebook Page ang alintuntunin kung paano mag register ONLINE para sa 43rd AGMA. \n\nMaraming salamat po. \n\nPlease, share.'
b'P A B A T I D \n\nScheduled Power Interruption\n\nAno: Trimming of Mango Tree above power lines at Barangay \nPayompon along National Road \n\nKailan: March 4, 2024 (MONDAY) from 9:00am to 1:00pm\n\nAffected Areas: So. Aroma, Tayamaan Mmaburao to Barangay \nDayap, Sta. Cruz\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized'
b'28 February 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\n\nTatlong poste ng telecom ang nakitang dahilan ng unscheduled power interruption sa San Jose Fil-oil recloser kaninang 1:36 PM. Ang mga posteng ito ay natagpuang dumidikit sa primary lines ng OMECO na naging dahilan ng brownout sa mga lugar na nasasakupan ng Fil-Oil recloser. Agad naman itong tinanggal ng mga maintenance ng OMECO at muling sinimulan ang power restoration. 4:09 PM na nang muling naibalik ang kuryente sa mga lugar na naapektuhan ng interruption.\n\nLabangan/Fil-oil \xe2\x80\x93 From Portion of Brgy. Magbay to Labangan Poblacion and Portion of Teachers Village to Labangan Shell, Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island\nMAGSAYSAY'
b'P A B A T I D \n\nScheduled Power Interruption\n\nAno: Upgrade of Primary line Construction C1-A5 from 35ft to 40ft at Armado, Abra De Ilog to fix sagging lines\n\nKailan: March 6, 2024 (WEDNESDAY) from 10:00am to 5:00pm\n\nAffected Areas: Tangkalan, Mamburao and Abra De Ilog Area\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized'
b'Inaanyayahan po ang lahat ng MCOs ng OMECO na makilahok sa gaganaping 43rd Annual General Membership Assembly (AGMA) sa March 3, 2024 (Linggo).\n\nMain venue: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \nSatellite venues: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2, Sablayan at \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc'
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x81 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nPlease bring and complete the following:\n1. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98.\n\nBabala para sa lahat ng member consumer owners (MCOs) na \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4-\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 diumano\xe2\x80\x99y mababang electric bill.\n\nAng pagnanakaw ng kuryente gaya ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb7\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf, \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5.\n\nAng mga lalabag sa batas na ito ay maaaring makulong, magbayad ng karampatang multa, at habang buhay na maputulan ng serbisyo ng kuryente.\n\nHinihiling po namin sa lahat na makiisa sa kampanya ng OMECO na mahuli at mapanagot ang lahat ng mga nagnanakaw ng kuryente dahil ito po ay b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, MCOs! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa FEBRUARY 2024 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 March 4 & 5, 2024 (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 March 6 & 7, 2024 (Brgy. Hall of Brgy. Mulawin)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 March 11, 2024 (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at para sa tuloy tuloy na sebisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

b'27 February 2024 | OMECO General Manager Engr. Celso Garcia attended the Sangguniang Panlalawigan Session to update and discuss the status of power supply and rate in the mainland Occidental Mindoro.'
b'26 February 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na maaaring tatagal ang power restoration sa mga lugar na apektado ng unscheduled power interruption sa San Jose Area, ngayong araw ng Lunes, 26 February 2024.\n\nAyon sa report sa OMECO, \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86. Kasalukuyan na pong nag t-trouble shooting ang NAPOCOR para agad na mahanap at maayos ang dahilan ng trouble sa kanilang linya.\n\nPatuloy na nakikipag tulungan ang OMECO sa NPC upang agad na maibalik ang kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado. \n\nMaraming salamat po.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nRecloser 1 - Municipal Compound, MHO to ML. b'P A B A T I D\n\nEmergency Power Interruption\n\nAno: Sparkling Neutral line at KI Wawa, Abra De Ilog \n\nKailan: February 23, 2024 \n\nDetalye: Ganap na 10:00pm ay nakatanggap tayo ng report patungkol sa umapoy na poste sa KI Wawa na kung saan agad namang pinuntahan ng ating maintenance team. Napag-alaman na dahil sa lakas ng hangin ay nagkaroon ng shorted incident ang pitong kabahayaan na naging sanhi ng pagsiklab. Tayo ay nagpapasalamat sa mabilis na pag responde din ng BFP Abra De Ilog upang maapula ang apoy at ating naisafety na rin ang mga naturang linya.\n\nStatus: Kailangan palitan ang mga linyang nasunog upang muling magkaroon ng serbisyo ng kuryente ang pitong kabahayan na apektado sa pangyayari na kasalukuyang ginagawa ng ating maintenance team. \n\nPara sa mga concerns at iba pang report tumawag lamang sa ating Hotline numbers:\nGlobe - 09166105913\nSmart - 09201390462\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized\n\nSalamat at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA'
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x81 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nPlease bring and complete the following:\n1. Updated Resume\n2. Application Letter (Indicating position applying for)\n3. Copy of Birth Certificate\n4. Certificate of employment (If with previous employment)\n5. Copy of Transcript of records and Diploma \n\nOnly complete requirements will be entertained.\n\nInterested/qualified applicants may submit their application at HRAD/PMODS Office (San Jose) or email us at pmods0325hrd@gmail.com on or before February 28, 2024 not later than 5'o clock in the afternoon."

Cruz found two burned bird. Ang mga apektadong lugar po ay naenergized ganap 4:49pm. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.'

serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa pinakamalapit na collection center sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a b'Pabatid\n\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\n\nKailan: February 22, 2024 Huwebes\n\nAno: Nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang power interruption sa buong Sta. Cruz Area ng 10:04am\n\nStatus: Kasalukuyang nagsasagawa ng Troubleshooting ang ating mainteanance team upang matukoy ang sanhi. \n\nApektadong lugar: Simula Public Market Poblacion Sta. Cruz hanggang Dayap, Sta. Cruz\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat'
b'22 February 2024\n\nOngoing Coordination meeting with ORMECO, NAPOCOR, DMCI, OMCPC, & TRANSCO.'
b'February 21, 2024 | \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat ng kamay-ari ng OMECO na may gaganaping \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf ngayong taong 2024. Inaanyayahan po ang lahat ng interesadong tumakbo bilang OMECO Board of Director ng San Jose I & II, Rizal, Calintaan, Sablayan, at Mamburao na makilahok sa nasabing aktibidad. Narito po ang mga importanteng petsa tungkol sa District Elections:\n\nRizal at San Jose I & II \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 14, 2024; Deadline of filing: APRIL 4, 2024\n\nSablayan, Mamburao, Calintaan \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 21, 2024; Deadline of filing: APRIL 11, 2024\n\nAng talaan ng mga botante (Masterlist) ay ipapaskil sa inyong barangay hall at munisipyo, mangyari lamang na suriin natin ito. Kung sakaling di sinasadyang nawala o di kaya ay mali ang baybay ng inyong pangalan ay kinakailangang gumawa ng request letter na nagsasaad ng inyong pangalan at isumite ito sa MSD office ng OMECO. Ang huling araw ng paghahain ng reklamo para sa nasabing talaan ay sa ika-9 ng Abril (Rizal at San Jose I & II) at sa ika-16 ng Abril (Sablayan, Mamburao at Calintaan).\n\nAng hindi paggamit sa takdang panahon para sa pagsasaayos ng talaan ay ipagpapalagay na pagbabaliwala ng kasapi sa kanyang karapatang bumoto ayon sa Article VI, Section 19, ng Electric Cooperative Election Code.\n\nPara sa karagdagang impormasyon, maaari pong pumunta sa opisina ng OMECO o tumawag sa mga sumusunod na hotline numbers:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'19 February 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.6673/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.5095/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.8502/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.5984/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.3696/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 18.0380/kWh\n\nAng pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ay dulot ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO na nagsimula noong September Billing hanggang sa kasalukuyan. \n\nMatatapos ito kapag muling nakapagpasa ng panibagong Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA o hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nInaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at maging masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02fupxdDhyRD5fveFusgnfnk6Z69zdn8pKPop53aaoXLkTbHzGpjebDXau9VCbrG8el\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02AJArSRbYBW6QuARFLtt46YBT6AQb4sSU3yatRjUfiTFzGtYojv7k8XHJsbfe3YtSl\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n\n#OMECOPowerRateFebruary2024\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'

b'Pabatid\n\nFebruary 18, 2024\n\nSa ginawang troubleshooting ng ating maintenance team upang maisaayos ang problemang nag dulot ng powrer interruption sa buong Abra De Ilog Area ay may natagpuang putol na Primary Line Phase Alpha sa So. Balite, Brgy. San Luis, Mamburao (ang Sitio po na ito ay nakaconnect sa linya ng Abra De Ilog) dahil sa corrosion. Agad itong isinaayos ng ating team at muling napailawan ang Abra De Ilog ganap na 7:58am. \n\nMakikita sa mga larawan ang nasabing sanhi ng hindi inaasahang power interruption.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA'
b"PABATID\n\nAno: UNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUIPTION\n\nKailan: February 17, 2024 nagsimula ng bandang 11:14am\n\nApektadong lugar: Abra De Ilog Area\n\nDetalte: Bandang 11:14am ay nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang power interruption sa MAPSA Area na kung saan sa power restoration activity ng ating maintenance team ay tinukoy na ang Abra De Ilog Area ay may line trouble kung kaya't nagkaroon ng power interruption. \n\nStatus: On-going pa po ang troubleshooting ng ating maintenance team upang maisaayos ang problema sa linyang nagiging sanhi ng power interruption sa apektadong lugar.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa MAPSA AREA para sa billing period na FEBRUARY 2024.\n\nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\n\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\n\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'
b'16 February 2024 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Power interruption due to line construction of CREI CELLSITE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: February 18, 2024 at 10:00am to 5:00pm\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\nBarangay 2 and portion of Barangay 4, Mamburao\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. b'Route of Disconnection sa SAMARICA Area para bukas, February 16, 2024. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7?\n\nPinagtibay at nilagdaan ang batas na ito upang masigurado ang tuluy-tuloy na serbisyo at daloy ng kuryente mula sa generasyon hanggang distribusyon ng kuryente. Pinoprotektahan nito ang ang transmission, sub-transmission, at distribution system mula sa anumang makasasagabal sa ilalim, ibabaw, at mga lugar na dinaraanan ng linya ng kuryente. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8-\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2? \n\n-Pagtatanim ng anumang uri ng halamang lumalaki o tumataas sa paligid ng linya ng kuryente o Power Line Corridor (PLC). \n-Pagtatayo ng anumang gusali o istruktura na maaaring makaapekto sa daloy ng kuryente sa loob ng PLC. \n-Pagsasagawa ng anumang uri ng delikadong gawaing maaaring makasagabal sa pagpapanatili ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n-Pagpigil sa mga otorisadong kawani o kinatawan ng tagapamahala ng mga linya ng kuryente na makapasok sa pribadong lupain upang gawin ang kanilang trabaho tulad ng maintenance, inspection, clearing activities, at iba pa. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a b'PABATID\n\nUNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nKailan: February 13, 2024 simula 5:24pm\n\nAno: Nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang problema sa planta kaninang 5:24pm kung kayat hindi ito makapagsupply ng kuryente na naging dahilan ng power interruption sa buong MAPSA Area. \n\nStatus: On-going pa rin ang trouble shooting ng OMCPC Mamburao plant upang malaman ang sanhi ng problema.\n\nKung sakaling ito ay maisaayos, ang paunang Load Shedding schedule ay patuloy pa ring susundin dahil sa problemang patuloy pa ring isinasaayos ng National Power Corporation (NPC) sa kanilang 69KV Transmission lines. \n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xac (\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94)\n\nInaanyayahan ng pamunuan ng OMECO ang lahat na makilahok sa gaganaping \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94) sa darating na \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0, araw ng linggo.\n\nAng AGMA ay taunang pagtitipon ng mga member-consumer-owners (MCOs) ng OMECO upang maiulat ang kasalukuyang estado ng electric cooperative at mahahalagang datos na kailangang malaman ng MCOs. Dito din itinatalakay ang mga proyektong naisakatuparan noong nakalipas na taon, at mga programang makakatulong sa pag-unlad ng kooperatiba at mga miyembro nito. Bukod dito, magkakaroon din ng open forum at raffle draw. \n\nAng AGMA ay gaganapin sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2. Ito din ay maaaring mapanood LIVE dito sa OMECO IEC Facebook Page. Maaari din pumunta ang mga MCOs mula Sablayan sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 at \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc (para sa MAPSA Area) upang mapanood ito LIVE naman via ZOOM App.\n\nManatiling naka-antabay dito sa OMECO IEC Official FB page para sa magiging alituntunin ng registration, raffle draw, at iba pang mahahalagang paalala tungkol sa AGMA.\n\nMaraming salamat po.\n\nPlease, share.'

b'05 February 2024 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f SCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION \xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: REPLACEMENT OF ROTTEN POLE C4-C5 CONSTRUCTION\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Sa February 7, 2024 mula 9:00am hanggang 5:00PM\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\nBarangay Cabacao, Abra De Ilog\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized.'
b'05 February 2024 | OMECO POWER UPDATE \n\n\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Correction of Clearance of Line between Fiber Optic and OMCPC Solar Transmission Line.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Sa February 5, 2024 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nSAN JOSE \xe2\x80\x93 From Portion of Pulang Lupa, Sitio Mabuhay, La Curva, Magbay, Camburay, San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monte Claro, Bayotbot and Manoot\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'Route of Disconnection karagdagan sa MAPSA, February 6, 2024. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente.\nPlease, share'
b'5 February 2024\n\nMakikita po sa mga larawan ang pumutok na Potential Transformer sa metering ng OMCPC Solar Power Plant na posibleng dahilan ng total tripped kaninang 12:38 PM. Samantala, natapos naman power restoration ng 2:53 ngayong hapon.'
b'5 February 2024 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nDahilan: OMCPC Plant Total Tripped\n\nPetsa at Oras: February 5, 2024, mula kaninang 12:38 AM\n\nMGA LUGAR NA APEKTADO:\n\nSAMARICA\nSABLAYAN\nMAPSA\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\n\n- Kasalukuyan pa pong inaalam ang dahilan ng pagtripped sa planta.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'4 February 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xb1\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na muli pong humiling ng extension ng power interruption ang OMCPC para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae (From Portion of Pulang Lupa, Portion of Sitio Mabuhay to La Curva, Magbay, Camburay, San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monte Claro, at Manoot) dahil patuloy pa rin ang ginagawang aktibidad sa planta.\n\nDahil dyan, aabutin ng hanggang \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80-\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 (9PM) para ma-restore ang kuryente sa buong San Jose Feeder 2.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'4 February 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xb1\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monte Claro, at Manoot) hanggang \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80-\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc b'On-Site Pre-Membership Seminar (PMS) at So. Pulo, Brgy. Lumangbayan, Sta. Cruz\nFebruary 1, 2024\n\nTayo po ay nagsagawa ng on-site PMS sa So. Pulo, Lumangbayan, Sta Cruz ngayong araw bilang tugon sa request ng Barangay Lumangbayan na ang ating opisina ay magsagawa ng PMS sa kanilang Sitio. Ito ay isa sa mga requirements sa Application ng New Connection at Change name. \n\nSa mga nagnanais po na magrequest ng Pre-Membership Seminar sa kanilang lugar, bukas po ang ating opisina para ito ay tugunan. Makipag unayan na lamang po sa ating opisina sa pamamagitan ng mga number na nasa ibaba. Salamat po at ingat po tayong lahat. \n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)'

b'Route of disconnection (Accounts with arrears): STA. CRUZ AREA\n\nDate: FEBRUARY 1 AND 2, 2024\n\nDetalye: Sa darating na February 1 AND 2, 2024 magkakaroon ng massive disconnection sa buong Sta. Cruz Area para sa mga accounts na merong Arrears or unpaid bill. Lahat ng madidisconnect sa mga araw na ito ay inaabisuhan na mag tungo na lamang sa OMECO Mamburao Office upang magprocess ng reconnection. Pinapaalalahanan po ang bawat isa na magsettle na po ng inyong power bill upang maiwasan ang pagkakaputol ng serbisyo  ng kuryente.\n \nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of January 29, 2024) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for January 31, 2024.'
b'Route of disconnection: BARANGAY UDALO, ABRA DE ILOG\n\nDate: FEBRUARY 5, 2024 (MONDAY)\n\nDetalye: Sa darating na February 5, 2024 magkakaroon ng massive disconnection sa buong Brgy. Udalo, Abra de Ilog. Lahat ng madidisconnect sa araw ng February 5, 2024 ay inaabisuhan na mag tungo na lamang sa OMECO Mamburao Office upang magprocess ng reconnection. Pinapaalalahanan po ang bawat isa na magsettle na po ng inyong power bill upang maiwasan ang pagkakaputol ng serbisyo  ng kuryente. Magkakaroon po ng Area Collection sa Brgy. Hall ng Tibag, Abra De Ilog sa darating na February 1 at 2, 2024. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.'
b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, MCOs! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa January 2024 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 February 1 and 2, 2024 (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 February 5 and 6, 2024 (Brgy. Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 February 7, 2024 (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang disconnection para sa tuloy tuloy na sebisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 para sa billing period na \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0.\n\nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO, i-message ang page na ito o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number ng OMECO.\nPara sa inyong gabay.\n\n#OMECOSAMARICAReadingSchedule2024\n#OMECOReadingSchedule2024\n#OMECOJanuaryReading2024\n#OMECO'
b'19 January 2024\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.2295/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.0717/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.4127/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.1606/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 20.9318/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 17.6002/kWh\n\nAng pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ay dulot ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO na nagsimula noong September Billing hanggang sa kasalukuyan. \n\nMatatapos ito kapag muling nakapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA o hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nInaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at maging masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02fupxdDhyRD5fveFusgnfnk6Z69zdn8pKPop53aaoXLkTbHzGpjebDXau9VCbrG8el\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02AJArSRbYBW6QuARFLtt46YBT6AQb4sSU3yatRjUfiTFzGtYojv7k8XHJsbfe3YtSl\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n#OMECOPowerRateJanuary2024\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'

\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2, hindi na kayo maaaring magbayad sa Portal. Kung naputulan, pumunta agad sa opisina ng OMECO sa \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb.\n- \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81, maaaring ma-access ang inyong ONLINE REFERENCE NUMBER sa pamamagitan ng pag register sa https://consumer.omeco.com.ph ( Narito ang link para sa inyong gabay: \nhttps://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02wMxqr2jbW9os9aRxgyJ6j9ZktJiAtzyntdJJrTwwpW5Gqu4DtgDjkDYL1v3GACeil )\n\n#landbanklinkbizportal\n#omecopaymentchannels'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x95 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\n\nMaaaring mag-bayad ng OMECO monthly bill sa PNB Digital App!\n\nPaano ito gawin? \n\nSimple lang. Sundin lamang ang mga steps na ito:\n\n1. I-download ang PNB Digital App sa Google Play Store at App Store.\n2. I- click ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 sa menu.\n3. Piliin ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 para sa gagawing payment.\n4. Piliin ang ang biller na \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0. (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2).\n5. lagay ang  \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf na makikita sa ilalim ng barcode.\n6. Ilagay ang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3) na natanggap sa inyong registered mobile number.\n7. I- check ang inyong\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 para sa payment receipt.\n8. \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x95 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 kung tama ang nakaltas. Kung hindi wasto ang nakaltas, ipagbigay-alam agad ito sa PNB.\n\nMaaari din magbayad over-the-counter sa lahat ng PNB Branches.\n\nTandaan:\n\n- Upang maipagpatuloy ang pagbayad online sa PNB, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5.\n\nAng mga lalabag sa batas na ito ay maaaring makulong, magbayad ng karampatang multa, at habang buhay na maputulan ng serbisyo ng kuryente.\n\nAng parusa para sa mga mapapatunayang lumabag sa batas na ito ay ang mga sumusunod:\n\n1. Para sa di-awtorisadong paggalaw/pagbukas ng metro (\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf) at paggamit ng anumang koneksyon upang nakawin ang kuryente.\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf - pagkabilanggo mula \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\n\xe2\x80\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae - mula \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac o magkasamang pataw ng mga naturan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 (\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac)\n\na. \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e-\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4) - hanggang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb na kaukulang kwenta ng ninakaw na kuryente.\n\nb. \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2) \xe2\x80\x93 hanggang 100% batay sa kasalukuyang buwanang kunsumo ng kuryente\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2May \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 para sa makakapagturo ng napatunayang PILFERERS.\n\n2. Para sa pagnanakaw ng mga kawad/materyales ng kuryente (\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84  \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\n\xe2\x80\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae - mula \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac o magkasamang pataw ng mga naturan\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2May \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 para sa makakapagturo ng napatunayang PILFERERS.\n\n3. \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb o yung \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xe2\x80\x93 P2,000 na kailangan mabayaran sa loob ng 24 oras. Kung hindi mabayaran sa itinakdang oras, puputulin ang electric connection ng lumabag.\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2May \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 para sa makakapagturo ng gumagawa ng flying connection.\n\n4. \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb o \xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xe2\x80\x93 P5,000\n\xe2\x80\xa2May \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 para sa makakapagturo ng gumagawa ng illegal reconnection.\n\nAng maaring maparusahan sa paglabag sa Republic Act 7832 o Anti-Electricity Pilferage Act at Coop Policy No. 01 Series of 2019 ay ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf, \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc ng kuryente kahit ito ay empleyado pa ng OMECO. \n\nKung ang consumer na \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc, \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac% \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 (P10,000) na \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac. Gayunpaman, ang differential billing na limang (5) taon ay babayaran pa rin.\n\nKung hindi mababayaran ang multang ipinataw ng kooperatiba sa mapapatunayang nagnanakaw ng kuryente, sya ay habang buhay na mapuputulan ng kuryente at kakasuhan ng OMECO ayon sa Republic Act 7832.\n\nHinihiling po namin sa lahat na makiisa sa kampanya ng OMECO na mahuli at mapanagot ang lahat ng mga nagnanakaw ng kuryente dahil \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 sa ating \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 na \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80.\n\nSa mga nais na magsumbong, lalo na laban sa empleyado ng OMECO na nag-aalok ng tampered na metro ay ipagbigay-alam ito sa tanggapan ng OMECO o itawag at itext sa mga hotline number. Maaari din po itong i-private message (PM)  dito sa OMECO IEC Facebook Page.\n\nMababasa ang kabuuan ng batas na ito sa link na nasa ibaba:\n https://www.officialgazette.gov.ph/.../republic-act-no-7832/\n\n#antipilferageact'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9f\x93\xa2\n\nPlease be informed that there will be \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 on:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf'\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\n\nHowever, those offices whose functions are involved in technical, are directed to continuously provide the necessary services needed.\n\nAll office transactions will resume on \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0.\n\nFor all emergency, reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines:\n\nSAMARICA 24/7 EMERGENCY: 0908-884-5539 (SMART)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255\n(GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPlease, share."
