(Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f\n\nAng lahat po ay pinag i-ingat sa mga scammer na nag-aalok ng mga aparato na nakakapagpababa diumano ng inyong bill sa kuryente. Wala pong katotohanan na ang aparatong ito ay nakakapag bawas ng konsumo ng inyong kuryente. Ito po ay \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0!\n\nAng mga scammer na ito ay kadalasang naniningil ng 10,000 pesos o higit pa. \n\nKung kayo po ay may alam sa mga nag-aalok ng ganitong serbisyo, i-report agad ito sa tanggapan ng OMECO, maaari din i-text o i-call sa mga hotline number ng koop o i-message dito sa OMECO IEC FB Page.\n\nMakikita sa ibaba ang sample ng aparatong binebenta upang makapangloko ng mga MCOs. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nMag-ingat po ang lahat.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 para sa billing period na \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf.\nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO, i-message ang page na ito o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number ng OMECO.\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.\n\n#OMECOSAMARICAReadingSchedule2023\n#OMECOReadingSchedule2023\n#OMECODecemberReading2023\n#OMECO'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\n\nMuling nag sama-sama ang lahat ng miyembro ng OBEA noong 14 Disyembre 2023, sa Thalia\xe2\x80\x99s Place, Mamburao. Kasabay nito ay ang panunumpa sa katungkulan ng mga bagong miyembro ng OBEA.\n\nAng taunang convention ay pinangunahan ni BOD Member Romal C. Tria kasama ang tatlo sa mga department manager ng OMECO at mga piling empleyado. Ito ay dinaluhan ng isang daan at dalawampu\xe2\x80\x99t tatlong (123) miyembro ng OBEA kasama na ang mga bagong miyembro nito.\n\nPangunahing kaganapan sa nasabing convention ay ang panunumpa ng mga bagong miyembro ng OBEA na dumaan sa masusing pagsusulit at pagsasanay upang matiyak na sila ay may sapat na kaalaman at kakayahan sa pag-iinstila ng linya ng kuryente sa gusali at bahay na naaayon sa mga patakaran na ipinatutupad ng kooperatiba.\n\nKabilang sa tinalakay sa convention ay ang OBEA Policy & By-Laws at Anti-Pilferage Policy. Nagtapos ang programa sa open forum.\n\nAng OBEA ay katuwang ng kooperatiba sa layunin nito na makapag bigay ng ligtas maayos, at dekalidad na serbisyo pang elektrisidad para sa lahat ng consumer ng OMECO. Matatandaan na ang OBEA ay aktibo sa line clearing operation o ang pagpuputol ng mga sanga ng punong maaaring maging sagabal sa linya ng kuryente. Ang convention na ito ay taunang programa para sa organisasyon bilang daan ng bawat isa na makapag ulat, makapag bigay ng suhestiyon, at panunumpa sa katungkulan ng mga magiging bagong miyembro. \n\n#OBEAConvention2023\n#OMECO'

b'December 18, 2023\n\nPUBLIC ADVISORY\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98.\n\nPara sa DECEMBER 2023 Billing, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 bilang konsiderasyon sa mataas na singil sa kuryente dahil sa pagtaas ng Generation Charge. Ngunit, tuloy pa rin ang putulan para sa mga hindi makakapag bayad ng electric bill sa Cut-off Date.\n\nHinihikayat pa rin ang bawat isa na mag bayad agad upang maiwasan ang mahabang pila sa araw ng putulan.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'18 December 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.4910/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.3332/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.6742/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.4221/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.1933/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 17.8617/kWh\n\nAng pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ay dulot ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO na nagsimula noong September Billing hanggang sa kasalukuyan. \n\nMatatapos ito kapag muling nakapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA o hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nInaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at maging masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02fupxdDhyRD5fveFusgnfnk6Z69zdn8pKPop53aaoXLkTbHzGpjebDXau9VCbrG8el\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02AJArSRbYBW6QuARFLtt46YBT6AQb4sSU3yatRjUfiTFzGtYojv7k8XHJsbfe3YtSl\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n#OMECOPowerRateDecember2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'
b'P A B A T I D \nTemporary Scheduled Power Interruption\nDecember 18, 2023\n\nAno: Magkakaroon ng Temporary Scheduled Power Interruption ang MAPSA Area\n\nApekatadong Lugar: \n\n10:00am to 1:00pm Abra De Ilog Area\n1:00pm to 4:00pm Sta. Cruz Area\n4:00pm to 7:00pm Mamburao Area\n\nDahilan: Dahil sa hindi inaasahang line trouble sa 69KV Transmission lines ng National Power Corporation (NPC) kahapon na kasalukuyan pa rin on-going ang troubleshooting, ang OMCPC Plant ng Tayamaan ay naka-island mode na kung saan sa pagtaas ng demand ng kuryente sa MAPSA Area ay kinakailangang magkaroon ng temporary load shedding sa ilang lugar. \n\nAng serbisyo po ng kuryente ay muling maibabalik sa normal operation pagnatapos ng NPC ang pag sasaayos ng kanilang linya.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'17 December 2023\n\nOMECO Power Restoration Update\n\nAll areas affected (SAMARICA, SABLAYAN, MAPSA) - ENERGIZED as of 8:38PM'
b'17 December 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nPetsa at Oras: December 17, 2023, mula kaninang 4:38PM\n\nMGA LUGAR NA APEKTADO:\n\nBuong Franchise Area ng OMECO (SAMARICA, SABLAYAN, MAPSA)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\n- Kasalukuyan pa pong inaalam ng technical team ang naging dahilan ng biglaang pagkawala ng ilaw.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\n- \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf-\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb & \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\n\nHowever, those offices whose functions are involved in technical, are directed to continuously provide the necessary services needed.\n\nAll office transactions will resume on \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86, \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf.\n\nFor all emergency, reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines:\n\nSAMARICA 24/7 EMERGENCY: 0908-884-5539 (SMART)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255\n(GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPlease, share.'

Kung kayo ay kumukonsumo ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, maaari kayong makatanggap ng diskwento sa bayarin sa kuryente.\n\nMagparehistro lamang sa OMECO at dalhin ang mga sumusunod:  \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. 4Ps ID o valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. Valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n4. Certification mula sa lokal na SWDO na inisyu sa loob ng huling anim na buwan, na nagpapatunay na ang kita ng pamilya ay mas mababa sa poverty threshold na itinakda ng PSA.\n\nKung ang metro ng kuryente ay hindi nakapangalan sa inyo, magdala rin ng Barangay Chairman certification na nagpapatunay na ikaw ang nakatira sa bahay na pag aari ng ibang tao. \n\nPara sa buong detalye ng Lifeline Rate Discount, bisitahin ang link na ito: \n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/5245975932172346'

b'Route of Disconnection sa SAMARICA bukas, December 07, 2023. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente.\n\nPlease, share.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\n\nIsa ka ba sa nawalan ng resibo ng kuryente? \n\nNarito ang paraan para malaman ang inyong bayarin sa kuryente nang hindi na pumupunta sa opisina ng OMECO.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad: Mag register sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x80://\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf.\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc.\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba.\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5. Punan ang mga hinahanap na detalye at hintayin ang verification at approval sa inyong email address.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae: Mag sign-in sa consumer portal gamit ang email address at password na inyong ni-register.\n\nBukod sa bayarin sa kuryente, makikita din sa consumer portal ang inyong \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 sa nagdaang buwan, \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9, at ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf ng inyong account.\n\nMaaari din magdagdag ng Account ng kuryente, pindutin lamang ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 at punan ang mga hinahanap na detalye.\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan tungkol dito, maaari nyo po itong i-comment sa ibaba.\n\n#OMECOConsumerPortal\n#OMECO'

b'01 December 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE \n\n\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Installation of Electric Post and Transformer Unit for Bonchon Commissary\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: December 2, 2023 (Sabado) mula 8:00 A.M. hanggang 11:00 A.M.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nSan Jose Recloser 2 - From Seminaryo, Portion of Mabini Extension to Sitio Taas\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\n\nAng paghihiwalay o pag-unbundle ng iba\xe2\x80\x99t ibang bahagi ng kabuuang singil sa kuryente ay itinakda ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2 o Electric Power Industry Reform Act (EPIRA) of 2001.\n\nAng pag-unbundle ay magpapakita sa mga konsumidores kung magkano ang napupunta sa mga serbisyo ng distribution utility companies, kasama ang mga electric cooperatives, at sa iba pang pinatutunguhan ng ibinabayad nila.\n\nNarito po ang "unbundled rates" para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 ng OMECO. Ito po ay base sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80.\n\n- Kung ikaw ay kumukunsumo ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 sa loob ng isang buwan, sa bawat P100 na iyong ibinabayad, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1.\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0 ang napupunta sa mga \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2), \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac.\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4 naman ang nakalaan para sa \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 from Old Jaravata Resort Going to OMCPC Pulang Lupa.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Sa December 2 hanggang December 3, 2023 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 of Sitio\nMabuhay to La Curva\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'Please be guided, MCOs. \xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f'
b'Power Bloc representatives ask Congress to probe NPC\xe2\x80\x99s failure to subsidize OMECO\xe2\x80\x99s generation cost\n \nThe Power Bloc representatives filed a resolution urging the House Committee on Energy to investigate the National Power Corporation\xe2\x80\x99s disallowance of the availment of the Occidental Mindoro Electric Cooperative (OMECO) of universal charge for missionary electrification (UCME) subsidy.\n \nIn filing House Resolution No. 1473, APEC Party-list Rep. Sergio Dagooc and PHILRECA Party-list Rep. Presley De Jesus said the member-consumer-owners (MCOs) of OMECO are currently experiencing an energy crisis because of the expensive electricity rates.\n \nThe October 2023 household electricity rate in Occidental Mindoro was at P21.83 per kilowatt hour (kWh). OMECO attributed the higher electricity to the generation charge and system loss charges, which amounted to P16.60 kWh.  \n \n\xe2\x80\x9cOMECO availed for the Universal Charge for Missionary Electrification subsidy for their execution of an emergency power supply agreement,\xe2\x80\x9d the resolution read. \xe2\x80\x9cThe NPC disallowed the availment of OMECO, resulting to a situation where the end-consumers pay for the true cost generation rate.\xe2\x80\x9d\n\nThe Power Bloc argued that there is no provision under the Republic Act No. 9136, or the EPIRA Law, that disallows the electric cooperatives (ECs) that execute Emergency Power Supply Agreements to avail of the UCME subsidy.\n\nIt added that the failure of the NPC to subsidize the generation costs of the emergency power supply agreement violates the Equal Protection Clause.\n \nOMECO, one of the 36 ECs in the country that rely on the operation of Small Power Utility Group (SPUG), serves the municipalities of Abra de Ilog, Mamburao, Sta. Cruz, Sablayan, Calintaan, Rizal, San Jose, and Magsaysay.    \n \nOMECO, through a petition, reported to the Energy Regulatory Commission (ERC) the failure of NPC to subsidize the generation cost that resulted from the emergency power supply agreement. The ERC, however, has yet to decide on OMECO\xe2\x80\x99s petition.\n \n\xe2\x80\x9cThere is a need for the Department of Energy and the other concerned government agencies to look into the present problem, and direct the NPC to subsidize the generation costs derived from the Emergency Power Supply Agreement,\xe2\x80\x9d the Power Bloc said in the resolution.\n \n\xe2\x80\x9cIt is imperative that ERC be directed to take quick action on the pending petition before their body to ensure proper services are provided to the member-consumer-owners of OMECO,\xe2\x80\x9d it added.\n\nVIA PHILRECA \xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f\xf0\x9f\x92\xa1'
b'November 29, 2023\n\nOMECO Mangrove Planting Activity at Sta. Theresa, Magsaysay.'
b'Route of Disconnection para sa Sablayan Area.\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill bago ang DEADLINE AT CUT-OFF DATE nito para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \nMaraming salamat po.'
b'Matagumpay na naidaos ang 4th Quarterly District MCO Officers Meeting noong ika-22 at 23 ngayong Nobyembre matapos bumisita ang ating NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda sa planta ng OMCPC upang mag-inspeksyon nitong nakaraang Martes, 21 Nov 2023. Nagtungo ang mga kinatawan ng pamunuan kasama ang ilang Board of Directors sa bawat Distrito ng SAMARICA sa mga Collection Centers upang ipabatid sa ating mga Member Consumer Owners Organization officers ang mga recent updates patungkol sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) at sa iba pang mga aktibidad at programa ng ating kooperatiba.'

Ngunit, tuloy pa rin ang putulan para sa mga hindi makakapag bayad ng electric bill sa Cut-off Date.\n\nHinihikayat pa rin ang bawat isa na mag bayad agad upang maiwasan ang mahabang pila sa araw ng putulan.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'

Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 December 6,7 and 8, 2023, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday, (Brgy. Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 December 11, 2023, Monday, (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at para sa tuloy tuloy na sebisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

b'Unscheduled Power Interruption\n\nReason: Defective 15KVA Transformer due to cut neutral line at So. Suntay, Brgy. Balansay, Mamburao\n\nDate: November 17, 2023\n\nTime: Reported at 4:30pm\n\nAffected Areas: Portion of So. Suntay, Brgy. Balansay, Mamburao\n\nDetails: 4:30 ng hapon ngayon ay naireport ang "one block no light" sa apektadong lugar, sa pagliline patrol ng ating maintenance team natagpuan ang putol na neutral line na naging sanhi ng pagkasira ng 15KVA Distribution transformer na nakaschedule mapalitan sa susunod na araw.\n\nIngat po tayong lahat at salamat sa pang-unawa\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energize'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 para sa billing period na \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf.\n \nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO, i-message ang page na ito o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number ng OMECO.\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.\n\n#OMECOSAMARICAReadingSchedule2023\n#OMECOReadingSchedule2023\n#OMECONovemberReading2023\n#OMECO'
b'November 17, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.5184/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.3606/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.7016/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.4495/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.2207/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 17.8891/kWh\n\nAng pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ay dulot ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO na nagsimula noong September Billing hanggang sa kasalukuyan. Matatapos ito kapag muling nakapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA o hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA. \n\nInaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02fupxdDhyRD5fveFusgnfnk6Z69zdn8pKPop53aaoXLkTbHzGpjebDXau9VCbrG8el\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02AJArSRbYBW6QuARFLtt46YBT6AQb4sSU3yatRjUfiTFzGtYojv7k8XHJsbfe3YtSl\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n#OMECOPowerRateNovember2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa MAPSA AREA para sa billing period na NOVEMBER 2023.\n\nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. b'14 November 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xe2\x80\xbc\xef\xb8\x8f Baroro at So. Gutad\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\nPlease, share.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'#NEAFacts | \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x98\x80) \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb7\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94).\n\nThis has been previously settled by a Supreme Court Decision which ordained that the creation of the CDA did not divest NEA of its regulatory jurisdiction over electric cooperatives nor its disciplinary jurisdiction over the members of the boards of directors and officers of these electric cooperatives. Moreover, the Court took judicial notice of the enactment of R.A. No. 10531 which \xe2\x80\x9cexpressly provides that the NEA\xe2\x80\x99s power of supervision applies whether an electric cooperative remains as a non-stock corporation or opts to register with the CDA as a stock cooperative\xe2\x80\xa6\xe2\x80\x9d \n\nLearn more about the case through this link: https://elibrary.judiciary.gov.ph/theboo.../showdocs/1/58844'

Theresa Recloser - Ilin and Ambulong Island\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. kinakailangan at karagdagang kaalaman, mangyaring tingnan ang in-upload na OMECO Policy No. 3.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b"Scheduled Power Interruption\n\nREASON: OVER-ALL LINE MAINTENANCE AT TAKE-OFF TAYAMAAN, MAMBURAO\n\nDATE: OCTOBER 28, 2023 (SATURDAY)\n\nTIME: From 9:00AM TO 12:00PM\n\nAREA'S AFFECTED: BUONG MAPSA AREA\nDetalye: BILANG PREPARATION SA DARATING NA HALALAN, MAGSASAGAWA NG LINE MAINTENANCE ANG ATING TEAM SA POWER TAKE-OFF TAYAMAAN, MAMBURAO UPANG SIGURADUHIN NA MAAYOS ANG MAGIGING SERBISYO NG KURYENTE SA HALALAN. \n\nSalamat po sa inyong pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management\n\nNOTE: Always consider our lines energized."
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x81 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nPlease bring and complete the following:\n1. b'October 26, 2023\n\nPUBLIC ADVISORY\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98.\n\nPara sa OCTOBER 2023 Billing, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 bilang konsiderasyon sa mataas na singil sa kuryente dahil sa pagtaas ng Generation Charge. Ngunit, tuloy pa rin ang putulan para sa mga hindi makakapag bayad ng electric bill sa Cut-off Date.\n\nGayunpaman, hinihikayat ang bawat isa na mag bayad agad upang maiwasan ang mahabang pila sa araw ng putulan.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0-\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nvia The Manila Times, Ire Joe Laurente\nOctober 24, 2023'
b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, MCOs! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa OCTOBER 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 November 3, 2023,Friday, (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 November 6 and 7, 2023, Monday and Tuesday, (Brgy. Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 November 9, 2023, Thursday, (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at para sa tuloy tuloy na sebisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'
b'October 24, 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 - SAMARICA AREA\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Adjustment of Protection Setting at Magbay Substation in preparation of the upcoming election\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Ngayong araw ng Martes, October 24, 2023 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nRecloser 1 - Municipal Compound, MHO to ML. b'23 October 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: May natagpuang leakage sa linya ng Fil-Oil Recloser\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: 10:02 A.M. ngayong araw ng Lunes\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nFil-oil Recloser \xe2\x80\x93Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island\n\nMAGSAYSAY AREA\n\nPower Restoration Update:\nPatuloy ang pagkukumpuni ng leakage na ito hanggang sa mga oras na ito. Maibabalik ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos na ang pagsasaayos sa linya na ito.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xad\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'SCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nREASON:  Relocation and Retirement of Pole at Paluan Municipal Compound \n\nDATE: OCTOBER 23, 2023 (MONDAY)\n\nTIME: 10:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. \n\nAREAS AFFECTED:  Paluan Area\nBrgy. b'October 20, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\nMagandang araw po.\n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a) para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 b'October 17, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 21.8387/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 19.6809/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 20.0219/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 19.7698/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 22.5410/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 19.2094/kWh\n\nAng pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ay dulot ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO na nagsimula noong September Billing hanggang sa kasalukuyan. Matatapos ito kapag muling nakapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA o hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nAng pagtaas sa Generation Charge para ngayong billing period ay dulot ng pagtaas ng fuel sa merkado. Mula sa PhP55 noong nakaraang buwan, tumaas ng tatlong piso kaya umabot ito ng PhP58 ngayon na nakaapekto naman sa pagtaas presyo ng kuryente. \n\nInaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02fupxdDhyRD5fveFusgnfnk6Z69zdn8pKPop53aaoXLkTbHzGpjebDXau9VCbrG8el\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02AJArSRbYBW6QuARFLtt46YBT6AQb4sSU3yatRjUfiTFzGtYojv7k8XHJsbfe3YtSl\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n\n#OMECOPowerRateOctober2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'

Alipaoy to Harisson, Paluan \n\nDETALYE: Nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang pagkawala ng kuryente sa Paluan Rural Health Unit na kinakailangang icheck ang kanilang transformer unit upang matukoy ang problema na makakaapekto sa mga apektadong lugar na nakadetalye.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management\n\nNote: Always consider our lines energized'

Kung kayo ay kumukonsumo ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, maaari kayong makatanggap ng diskwento sa bayarin sa kuryente.\n\nMagparehistro lamang sa OMECO at dalhin ang mga sumusunod:\n \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. 4Ps ID o valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n1. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\nPlease, share.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

Ito po aayusin ngayong hapon ngunit hindi pa po natin masabi kung anong oras ito matatapos. Maibabalik ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag naayos na ito.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nMagandang balita para sa mga consumer nating \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81! \n\nExtended \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0 ang full implementation ng Lifeline Rate Program ng gobyerno. Kung kayo ay kumukonsumo ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, maaari kayong makatanggap ng diskwento sa bayarin sa kuryente.\n\nMagparehistro lamang sa OMECO at dalhin ang mga sumusunod: \n \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. 4Ps ID o valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n1. Certification mula sa lokal na SWDO na inisyu sa loob ng huling anim na buwan, na nagpapatunay na ang kita ng pamilya ay mas mababa sa poverty threshold na itinakda ng PSA.\n\nPara sa buong detalye ng Lifeline Rate Discount, bisitahin ang link na ito: \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02mugD5wvgfBRWJpHYUUidtQ7vMzYSgjyHP7uDULsBcibnCaTr2rcEGo6QAoW8Yqhol'

b'P A A L A L A\n\nTayo po ay magsasagawa ng Disconnection sa mga sumusunod na route sa mga petsang nakatakda para sa mga unpaid bills.\n\nOctober 6, 2023: FRIDAY\n\nMamburao Area\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang ating mga consumer na mag settle na ng kanilang electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit po ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming Salamat at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n- OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Pabatid\nOctober 5, 2023\n\nAno: Emergency Power Interruption sa Buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: October 5, 2023 ngayong 2:00pm hanggang 4:00pm\n\nApektadong Lugar:  Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDetalye: Natagpuan ang isang nagbabagang Primary Jumper sa Power Take-Off OMCPC Tayamaan na kung saan kailangan itong agarang maisaayos upang maiwasan ang mas malalang problema. Makikita ang letter at actual temperature gauge sa mga larawan sa ibaba. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

Marcos, Jr. na bigyan ng subsidiya ang Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) para mapababa ang mataas na presyo ng kuryente sa Mainland Occidental Mindoro.\n\nKung ikaw ay isang lehitimong MCO ng OMECO o sa iyo nakapangalan ang kuntador ng iyong kuryente, maaari kang pumirma sa manipestong ito bilang pakikiisa sa hiling na subsidy mula sa gobyerno. \n\nPumunta lamang po sa MSD office ng OMECO San Jose, Sablayan at Mamburao Area para sa inyong lagda. \n\nMaraming salamat po.\n\nPlease, share.'

Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 October 9, 2023, Wednesday, (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at para sa tuloy tuloy na sebisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

Rizal, Rizal\nOct. 2, 2023 - So. D6 & D7, San Agustin, Central\nOct. 3, 2023 - Brgy. Aguas, Rizal\nOct. 3, 2023 - So. Lamis & So. Curanta, San Agustin, Central\nOct. 4, 2023 - Brgy. Pitogo, Rizal\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'PUBLIC ADVISORY\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98.\n\nPara sa September 2023 Billing, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 bilang konsiderasyon sa mataas na singil sa kuryente dahil sa pagtaas ng Generation Charge. Ngunit, tuloy pa rin ang putulan para sa mga hindi makakapag bayad ng electric bill sa Cut-off Date.\n\nGayunpaman, hinihikayat ang bawat isa na mag bayad agad upang maiwasan ang mahabang pila sa araw ng putulan.\n\nPara sa inyong katanungan, i-comment lamang po ito sa ibaba.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x95 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\n\nMaaari nang mag-bayad ng OMECO monthly bill sa PNB Digital App.\n\nPaano ito gawin? \n\nSimple lang. Sundin lamang ang mga steps na ito:\n\n1. I-download ang PNB Digital App sa Google Play Store at App Store.\n2. I- click ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 sa menu.\n3. Piliin ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 para sa gagawing payment.\n4. Piliin ang ang biller na \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0. (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2).\n5. Ilagay ang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf (ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85), \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0/\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac - ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf), \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0/\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x97/\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac - ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf), \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81.\n6. Ilagay ang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3) na natanggap sa inyong registered mobile number.\n7. I- check ang inyong registered e-mail address para sa payment receipt.\n\nMaaari din magbayad over-the-counter sa lahat ng PNB Branches.\nTandaan: \n- Upang maipagpatuloy ang pagbayad online sa PNB, dapat meron kang bank account sa PNB.\n- Hindi na maaaring magbayad sa PNB DIGITAL APP pagkatapos ng inyong deadline date o sa araw ng inyong cut-off date.\n- Kung putol na ang inyong kuryente, hindi na kayo maaaring magbayad sa App. Kung naputulan, pumunta agad sa opisina ng OMECO sa BILLING Section.\n\nMaraming Salamat po!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

b'Pabatid\nTemporary Scheduled Power Interruption\n\nAno: Magkakaroon ng Temporary Scheduled Power Interruption ang MAPSA Area\n\nApektadong Lugar: \n\nSeptember 27, 2023\n1:00pm to 3:00pm Sta. Cruz Area\n3:00pm to 5:00pm Mamburao Area\n\nDahilan: Dahil sa ginagawang repair activity ng National Power Corporation (NPC) sa kanilang Substation Sa Tayamaan Mamburao, ang OMCPC Plant ng Tayamaan ay naka-island mode na kung saan sa pagtaas ng demand ng kuryente sa MAPSA Area kinakailangang magkaroon ng temporary load shedding sa ilang lugar. \nAng serbisyo po ng kuryente ay muling maibabalik sa normal operation pag natapos ng NPC ang kanilang activity.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Pabatid\n\nEmergency Power Interruption\nSeptember 27, 2023\n\nREASON: High-frequency due to drop of peak load at OMCPC plant\n  \nDATE: SEPTEMBER 27, 2023 (WEDNESDAY)\n\nTIME: 10:20am \n\nAREAS AFFECTED:  Buong MAPSA AREA\nDetalye: Dahil sa biglaang pag baba ng load demand sa buong MAPSA Area nagkaroon ng pagttrip sa makina ng OMCPC Plant. Kasabay nito ay may natagpuang nagbabaga sa may power take-off sa Tayamaan, Mamburao na agad namang isinagawa ng ating Maintenance Team ang pagsasaayos.\n\nNOTE: Always consider our lines energized.'
b'PABATID\n\nEmergency Power Interruption\n\nREASON: May nakitang umuusok sa 52ma4 Tayamaan Sub Station  ng National Power Corporation (NPC)\n\nDATE: SEPTEMBER 27, 2023 (WENESDAY)\n\nTIME: 5:11am \n\nAREAS AFFECTED:  Buong MAPSA AREA\n\nDetalye: Kailangang gumawa ng pag sasaayos ang National Power Corporation (NPC) sa kanilang Substation sa Mamburao dahil sa nakitang umuusok sa Bus Bar ng kanilang equipment, nagdulot ito ng power interruption sa mga apektadong lugar habang nag-island mode naman ang OMCPC Plant upang makapag supply ng power sa MAPSA Area.\n\nNOTE: Always consider our lines energized.'

Tamisan, Brgy. Poypoy, Calintaan \nSept. 28, 2023 - So. Peri, Brgy. Poypoy, Calintaan\nSept. 29, 2023 - So. Layaban, Brgy. Poypoy, Calintaan\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'PUBLIC ADVISORY\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98.\n\nPara sa September 2023 Billing, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 bilang konsiderasyon sa mataas na singil sa kuryente dahil sa pagtaas ng Generation Charge. Ngunit, tuloy pa rin ang putulan para sa mga hindi makakapag bayad ng electric bill sa Cut-off Date.\n\nGayunpaman, hinihikayat ang bawat isa na mag bayad agad upang maiwasan ang mahabang pila sa araw ng putulan.\n\nPara sa inyong katanungan, i-comment lamang po ito sa ibaba.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'

Mangarin\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of September 20, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for September 22, 2023'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.8122/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.6544/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.9954/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.7433/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.5145/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 18.1829/kWh\n\nPangunahing nakaapekto sa pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ang Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Matatandaan na pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO simula ngayong September billing hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA o hanggang sa muling makapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA.\n\nSa ngayon ay inaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid, balita, at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/591055759883608\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/614411867547997\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/663772522366394/\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/633633918894982/\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n\n#OMECOPowerRateSeptember2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'
b'21 September 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Correction of Hotspot at Magbay Substation\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: September 21, 2023 (Huwebes) mula 01:30 hanggang 5:00 ngayong hapon\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nLabangan/Fil-oil \xe2\x80\x93 Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island, Labangan Poblacion, Portion of Teachers Village to Labangan Shell\n\nMAGSAYSAY AREA\n\nDetalye: Sa pag-inspection ng OMECO Technical Team kahapon sa Magbay Substation, natagpuan ang mga Hotspot na kailangan nang maisaayos sa lalong madaling panahon. Ang mga hotspot na ito ang nakikitang dahilan ng mga unscheduled power interruption o yung mga panandaliang brownout nitong nakaraang araw.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x81 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nPlease bring and complete the following:\n1. b'PABATID\nSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nREASON: NPC\xe2\x80\x99S RECTIFICATION AT MAMBURAO 10 MVA SUBSTATION TRANSFORMER \n\nDATE: SEPTEMBER 21, 2023 (THURSDAY)\n\nTIME:  10:00am \n\nAREAS AFFECTED: Buong MAPSA AREA\nDetalye: Sa gagawing pag sasaayos ng National Power Corporation (NPC) sa kanilang Substation sa Mamburao ay asahan ang panandaliang power interruption sa apektadong lugar habang mag-iisland mode ang OMCPC Plant upang makapag supply ng power.\n\nNOTE: Always consider our lines energized.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
