b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\n\nTagumpay ang isinagawang Oath Taking Ceremony ng mga bagong accredited electrician noong araw ng Sabado, Setyembre 16, 2023 sa OMECO Board Room, San Jose.\n\nAng nasabing seremonya ay pinangunahan ni General Manager Engr. Celso Garcia kasama ang ilan sa mga department managers at piling empleyado ng OMECO. Dinaluhan ito ng 21 accredited electricians mula sa bayan ng Magsaysay, Mamburao, Paluan, Rizal, Sablayan, at San Jose. Ipinaliwanag sa mga bagong electrician ang guidelines at by-laws ng OBEA gayundin ang mga policy ng OMECO kabilang na ang Anti-Pilferage Policy.\n\nAng mga pumasang electrician ay dumaan sa masusing pagsasanay upang matiyak na sila ay may sapat na kaalaman at kakayahan sa pag-iinstila ng linya ng kuryente sa gusali at bahay na naaayon sa mga patakaran na ipinatutupad ng kooperatiba.'
b'19 September 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: OBEA Line Clearing Activity\n \n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1:  September 19, 2023 mula 1:00 hanggang 3:00 ng hapon\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nSo. Marumpungin, Calintaan\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.8122/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.6544/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.9954/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.7433/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.5145/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 18.1829/kWh\n\nPangunahing nakaapekto sa pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ang Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Matatandaan na pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO simula ngayong September billing hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA o hanggang sa muling makapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA.\n\nSa ngayon ay inaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid, balita, at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/591055759883608\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/614411867547997\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/663772522366394/\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/633633918894982/\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n\n#OMECOPowerRateSeptember2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'

\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: OBEA Line Clearing Activity sa \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb 2023 - Sitio Cambiswer, Calintaan\nSept. 20, 2023 - So. Baroro 1, So. Riverside, Malatikwang\nSept. 21, 2023 - So. Wawa and So. Prugrinan, Iriron\nSept. 22, 2023 - So. Kiwkiw, Iriron\nSept. 23, 2023 - Dagupan, Proper\n\nIsinasagawa ang line clearing activity upang maiwasan ang mga di inaasahang brownout o yung unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahon na may bagyo o malakas ang hangin. Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\n\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\n\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

Asahan na ibabalik agad ang suplay ng kuryente sa mga lugar na apektado kapag natapos ang paglilinis ng mga linya. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\n\nCorrection of Secondary line at San Roque 2, San Jose.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\n\nCorrection of Line (uprating) along Mendiola Salt Farm, San Jose.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9f\x91\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e: Natagpuan ang isang paniki na nasunog dahil sa pag dikit nito sa linya ng kuryente na siyang naging dahilan ng pagkawala ng ilaw mula Batasan hanggang Manoot kaninang umaga.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: Ongoing MCO EC-Wide Federation 3rd Quarterly Meeting at Palayok Ni Jing, Buenavista, Sablayan.'
b'September 14, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 20.8122/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 18.6544/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 18.9954/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 18.7433/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 21.5145/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 18.1829/kWh\n\nPangunahing nakaapekto sa pagtaas sa taripa ng kuryente ang Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). Matatandaan na pumasok ang OMECO sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC upang masiguro ang tuloy tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO. \n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO simula ngayong September billing hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA o hanggang sa muling makapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA.\n\nSa ngayon ay inaanyayahan pa rin ang bawat isa na patuloy na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente.\n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at EPSA, maaaring ma-access sa mga link na nasa ibaba ang mga pabatid, balita, at Press Conference patungkol dito.\n\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/591055759883608\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/614411867547997\n- https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/663772522366394/\n-https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/videos/633633918894982/\n-https://www.facebook.com/100069375662661/videos/289279400525855\n\n#OMECOPowerRateSeptember2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\n\nReplacement of Rotten Pole at San Roque 2 near Regalado Abner Residence.'

b'08 September 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Defective Pin Type Insulator at La Curva front of Elementary School\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: September 08, 2023, mula 10:10 AM hanggang sa matapos ang pagsasaayos sa lugar\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xe2\x80\x93 La Curva, Magbay, Camburay, San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monteclaro and Bayotbot and Manoot\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2:\n\n- Ito ang nakitang trouble sa linya na maaaring dahilan ng unscheduled interruption sa malaking bahagi ng Feeder 2 simula kaninang umaga. Sa ngayon, ongoing na po ang pagsasaayos sa nasirang insulator.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\nALL AREAS AFFECTED (F2) ENERGIZED AS OF 10:39 AM today.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. Kung kayo ay kumukonsumo ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, maaari kayong makatanggap ng diskwento sa bayarin sa kuryente.\n\nMagparehistro lamang sa OMECO at dalhin ang mga sumusunod:  \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. 4Ps ID o valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n1. Duly accomplished Lifeline rate application form\n2. Pinakabagong bill ng kuryente\n3. Valid government issued ID na may pirma at address ng applicante\n4. Certification mula sa lokal na SWDO na inisyu sa loob ng huling anim na buwan, na nagpapatunay na ang kita ng pamilya ay mas mababa sa poverty threshold na itinakda ng PSA.\n\nKung ang metro ng kuryente ay hindi nakapangalan sa inyo, magdala rin ng Barangay Chairman certification na nagpapatunay na ikaw ang nakatira sa bahay na pag aari ng ibang tao. \n\nPara sa buong detalye ng Lifeline Rate Discount, bisitahin ang link na ito: \n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid02mgswqrhZNvQr93UAMfpuDi1CkEHnqJAgz42aj9NJbmenAFyFA7jjQHu1GEqJP9msl'
b'05 SEPTEMBER 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Relocation and Upgrading of Pole at Concepcion Calintaan near Rusi\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Sa darating na September 07, 2023 (HUWEBES) mula 9:00 ng umaga hanggang 5:00 ng hapon\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nCalintaan Area \xe2\x80\x93 From Topsteel to Concepcion, Iriron, Malpalon, Poypoy\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'September 3, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\nSa pagpasok ng OMECO sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) noong July 25, 2023, inaasahan na tataas ang rates ng kuryente sa darating na September 2023 Billing o sa susunod pang billing period.\n\nBatay sa pinakabagong computation ng pinagsama-samang rates ng plantang pinagkukunan natin ng kuryente, \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac.\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1% \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9.\n\nPangunahing nakaapekto sa pagtaas ng taripa sa kuryente ang EPSA, dahil ito ay hindi sakop ng subsidiya na ibinibigay ng gobyerno. Ibig sabihin, True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO sa mga susunod na buwan ng taong ito o hanggang sa muling makapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA.\n\nSa ngayon, hinihikayat ang bawat isa na maging praktikal at masinop sa pag gamit ng kuryente. \n\nUpang mas malinawan sa usapin ng power supply at rates, antabayanan ang Press Conference na pangungunahan ng OMECO Board of Directors bukas, Setyembre 4, 2023, 2:00 PM, LIVE! dito sa OMECO IEC Facebook Page.\n\nMakikita naman sa ibaba ang computation sa rates ng kuryente \xf0\x9f\x91\x87'
b'PABATID\n\nSEPTEMBER 1, 2023\n\nAno: ONE BLOCK NO LIGHT AT SEASIDE, PAYOMPON, MAMBURAO\n\nKailan: SIMULA 10:28AM SEPTEMBER 1, 2023\n\nDahilan: Nakatanggap ang ating opisina ng report na walang kuryente ang naturang block ng seaside, payompon, mamburao bandang 10:28am ngayong umaga. Sa pag troubleshoot ng ating maintenance team napagtupan ang isang defective 100kva distribution transformer na tinamaan ng kidlat. Kailangang ito ay palitan upang maibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa naturang lugar. Dahil sa laki ng capacity ng transformer na nasira, ito ay kailangan pang kunin sa omeco main office sa san jose at nakatakda rin palitan  bukas September 2, 2023.\n\nSalamat po sa inyong pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'EARLIER TODAY: Correction of Leaning Pole at Sto. Ni\xc3\xb1o, Rizal.\n\nAll areas affected (NORTH FEEDER) energized as of 7:34PM today.'
b'31 August 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Correction of leaning pole caused by telecom cable caught by a truck\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: August 31, 2023 (Huwebes) mula 04:51 ng hapon hanggang sa matapos ang pagsasaayos ng poste ngayong araw\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xe2\x80\x93 Brgy. Central at San Agustin\nRIZAL \nCALINTAAN\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'Isang malaking hakbang na maituturing ang pagpupulong ng ating mga MCO Organization Chairman na kumakatawan sa bawat barangay na nasasakupan ng ating serbisyong pang-elektrisidad dito sa lalawigan. Sa naganap na 3rd Quarterly District MCOO Meeting ngayong buwan, August 22-23, 2023, pangunahing paksang tinalakay ang kasalukuyang iniimplimentang Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) na kung saan ay may epekto sa billing ng ating mga Member-Comsumer-Owners (MCO) sa susunod na buwan ng Setyembre.\n\nAng naturang EPSA ay ang pagbili natin ng kuryente kay OMCPC simula July 25, 2023 nang walang subsidiyang matatanggap mula sa gobyerno. Ang negosasyong ito\xe2\x80\x99y sa pagitan ng OMECO at OMCPC dahil ito lamang ang available power supplier na kayang mag-supply ng 20 megawatts para sa buong SAMARICA. Ibig sabihin, ang nakonsumo nating kuryente per kwh sa loob ng isang buwan ay ating babayaran ng buo o sa tunay na presyong ipinataw ng OMCPC dahilan na lamang ng posibleng pagtaas ng ating bayarin na \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbbg \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3% \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nBilang aksyon ng ating mga MCOO officers sa napapanahong usapin, napagdesisyunan ng bawat distrito na gumawa ng mga resolusyong makatutulong sa pagpapabilis ng proseso ng pagapruba ng PSA SAMARICA at upang hindi na mas lalong tumagal ang nasabing EPSA.'
b'Power Restoration Update:\n\nAll areas affected (F1) Energized as of 2:16PM today.'
b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, MCOs! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa AUGUST 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 SEPTEMBER 4, 2023, Monday, (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 SEPTEMBER 5 AND 6, 2023,Tuesday and Wednesday, (Brgy. Hall ng Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 SEPTEMBER 8, 2023, Friday, (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

areas affected (F1) Energized as of 2:16PM today.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. b'Pabatid\nAugust 28, 2023\n\nAno: Unscheduled Power Interruption sa Buong Abra De Ilog Area\n\nKailan: Nagsimula ng August 27, 2023 10:04pm \n\nApektadong Lugar:  Buong Abra De Ilog Area \n\nDetalye: Nagsimula ang mga hindi inaasahang power interruptions sa buong Abra de Ilog Area kagabi ng 10:04pm. May natagpuang putol na primary line sa So. Subing, boundary ng Brgy. San Luis at Tayamaan Mamburao na kasalukuyang isinasaayos ating maintenance team.\n\nSa ginagawang trouble shooting naibalik na ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa ilang bahagi ng Abra De Ilog area ngunit may ilan pang bahagi ang apektado ng mga hindi inaasahang dahilan ng power interruption dala ng sama ng panahon. \n\nStatus: Kasalukuyan pong tuloy tuloy ang troubleshooting na ginagawa ng ating maintenance team upang maibalik muli ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa mga apektadong lugar. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Pabatid\nAugust 28, 2023\n\nAno: Unscheduled Power Interruption sa Buong Sta. Cruz Area\n\nKailan: Nagsimula ng August 27, 2023 7:21pm \n\nApektadong Lugar:  Buong Sta. Cruz Area\n\nDetalye: Nagsimula ang mga hindi inaasahang power interruptions sa buong Sta. Cruz Area kahapon ng 7:21pm. May natagpuang putol na primary line sa So. Buboy, San Vicente, Sta. Cruz na agad namang inayos ng ating maintenance team. May natagpuan ding mga sumampay n punong kahoy sa ilang bahagi ng Brgy. Alacaak. \n\n7:53am naibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa ilang bahagi ng Sta. Cruz area ngunit may ilan pang bahagi ang apektado ng mga hindi inaasahang dahilan ng power interruption dala ng sama ng panahon. \n\nStatus: Kasalukuyan pong tuloy tuloy ang troubleshooting na ginagawa ng ating maintenance team upang maibalik muli ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa mga apektadong lugar. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'26 August 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nDAHILAN: Naputol na Primary Line bago dumating sa tulay ng La Curva\n\nOras: Mula 11:35 PM ng August 25, 2023\n\nMGA LUGAR NA APEKTADO:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xe2\x80\x93 La Curva, Magbay, Camburay, San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monteclaro and Bayotbot and Manoot\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\nKasalukuyan pong naghahanda ang Technical Team ng mga materyales na gagamitin sa pagsasaayos ng naputol na primary line.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. b'24 August 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\n\nIsa ang OMECO sa mga electric cooperatives na nagsagawa ng Nationwide Line Clearing and Tree Planting Activity ngayong araw ng Huwebes bilang bahagi ng selebrasyon ng ika-54 Anniversary ng National Electrification Administration (NEA) at 14th National Electrification Awareness Month (NEAM) 2023.\n\nSa kabila ng maulang panahon, nakapagtanim ng 100 seedlings ang ilan sa empleyado ng OMECO Sablayan sa Sitio Yapang, Brgy. Batong Buhay sa tulong ng Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR). Kasabay nito ay nagsagawa naman ng line clearing activity ang ilan sa mga empleyado ng OMECO sa Bayan ng Paluan at Purok 2B, Brgy. Central, San Jose, Occidental Mindoro. \n\nIto ay taunang isinasagawa ng koop upang malinis ang mga sanga ng punongkahoy na nakasasagabal sa daloy ng kuryente na madalas nagiging dahilan ng biglaang pagkawala ng kuryente lalo na sa panahon na malakas ang hangin at may bagyo.\n\n#OMECOLineClearing\n#OMECOTreePlanting\n#NEAM2023'

b"23 August 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\nSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nREASON: Cooperate with the National Electrification Administration (NEA) Line Clearing Day to clear our lines causing unexpected power interruption and system loss\n\nWHEN: This coming AUGUST 24, 2023 (THURSDAY) from 8:00am to 5:00pm\n\nAFFECTED AREAS:\nPaluan Area\n\nNote: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (For everyone's safety, let's still be careful and consider alive or flowing electricity in our lines because the electricity service may be restored once the works promised are done without further notice)\n\nOMECO MANAGEMENT"
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa SAMARICA AREA para sa billing period na \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf. \n\nMakikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO, i-message ang page na ito o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number ng OMECO.\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

b'August 18, 2023\n\nSa pakikiisa po ng ating kooperatiba sa ginaganap na Brigada Eskwela 2023 na may temang \xe2\x80\x9cBayanihan para sa matatag na paaralan,\xe2\x80\x9d tayo po ay nagbigay ng tulong ngayong araw sa Balansay Elementary School sa pamamagitan ng ating mga kasamahan.\n\nTayo po ay  nag clearing ng mga punong kahoy para sa kaligtasan ng bawat isa na tinukoy ng paaralan na may dalang panganib. Nagsagawa din po tayo ng inspection ng mga linya at nag saayos ng mga problema kagaya ng loose connection at sagging lines. \n\nAng atin pong kooperatiba ay nakikiisa sa ating gobyerno upang siguraduhin ang isang ligtas at matatag na paaralan sa pag sisimula ng taong panuruan 2023.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'August 18, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 12.2425/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 10.0847/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 10.4257/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 10.1736/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 12.9448/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 9.6132/kWh\n\nIpinapaalala po sa lahat na \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 dahil sa pagpasok ng OMECO sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). \n\nPara sa karagdagang kaalaman, ang OMECO ay pumasok sa EPSA dahil walang inilabas na order o Provisional Authority to Operate ang ERC para sa Joint Application ng OMECO at OMCPC sa  SAMARICA Power Supply Agreement (PSA) o ERC Case No. 2023-045 RC.\n\nUpang masiguro ang tuloy-tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa buong franchise area ng OMECO, minabuti ng OMECO na pumasok sa EPSA noong July 25, 2023 kasama ang OMCPC dahil ito lamang ang available power supplier na kayang suplayan ang buong SAMARICA. Sa pagsisimula ng EPSA, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3% \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA o hanggang sa muling makapagpasa ng panibagong Joint Application ang OMECO at OMCPC para sa SAMARICA PSA.\n\nAng EPSA ay hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t True Cost Generation Rate (TGCR) o ang kabuuang halaga ng kuryente ang babayaran ng lahat ng konsyumer ng OMECO sa mga susunod na buwan ng taong ito. \n\n#OMECOPowerRateAugust2023\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nPlease be informed that there will be \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 on \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf in observance of Ninoy Aquino Day (A Special Non-Working Day).\n\nAll office transactions will resume on \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86, \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf.\n\nFor all emergency, reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines:\nSAMARICA 24/7 EMERGENCY: 0908-884-5539 (SMART) \nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255\n(GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPlease, share.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7'
b'Pabatid\nAugust 18, 2023\n\nAno: NATIONAL POWER CORPORATION (NPC) REQUEST FOR SHUTDOWN OF 69KV TRANSMISSION LINE\n\nDetalye: Magsasagawa ang NaPoCor (NPC) ng relocation ng kanilang poste ng 69KV Line sa bayan ng Sablayan sa darating na August 19, 2023 (Sabado) at August 20, 2023 (Linggo) 8:00am to 5:00pm. Ito ay mag reresulta ng desynchronization o pagbitaw ng MAPSA Area sa supply ng kuryente galing sa mga planta sa buong lalawigan. Ang mag susupply ng kuryente sa MAPSA Area ay mangagaling sa Planta ng OMCPC sa Tayamaan, Mamburao na may kakayahang magbigay ng hanggang 4.5MW lamang sa kasalukuyan. Ito ay maaaring mag dulot ng pailan ilang rotational bronwout kung sakaling hihigit sa 4.5MW ang kailangang supply ng buong MAPSA Area. \n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO Mapsa Management'
b'August 17, 2023\n\nSa pakikiisa po ng ating kooperatiba sa ginaganap na Brigada Eskwela 2023 na may temang \xe2\x80\x9cBayanihan para sa matatag na paaralan,\xe2\x80\x9d tayo po ay nagbigay ng tulong ngayong araw sa Pinagturilan National Highschool sa pamamagitan ng ating mga kasamahan.\n\nTayo po ay  nag clearing ng mga punong kahoy para sa kaligtasan ng bawat isa na tinukoy ng paaralan na may dalang panganib. Nagsagawa din po tayo ng inspection ng mga linya at nag saayos ng mga problema kagaya ng loose connection at sagging lines. \n\nAng atin pong kooperatiba ay nakikiisa sa ating gobyerno upang siguraduhin ang isang ligtas at matatag na paaralan sa pag sisimula ng taong panuruan 2023.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

b'August 17, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xe2\x80\x93 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \n\nSa pagpupulong ng OMECO at mga Telecommunication Company ng probinsya kahapon, muling tinalakay ang usapin patungkol sa mga linya ng TelCo na kasalukuyang nakadikit sa mga Service Drop Wire ng consumer ng OMECO at mga linya na mas mataas pa sa linya ng kuryente. \n\nSa update ng PLDT, kanilang inilahad na sinisimulan na nila ang pagtatanggal ng mga linya nilang disconnected na. Samantala, iminungkahi naman ni General Manager Engr. Celso Garcia na magbigay ang mga TelCo ng mga larawan nito na nagpapakita ng pag-aayos ng kani-kanilang mga linya gayundin ang pagkukumpuni ng mga linyang disconnected na bilang parte ng monitoring ng OMECO. \n\nSa pagtatapos ng pagpupulong, binigyan ni GM Garcia ng hanggang December 31, 2023 ang mga TelCo na matapos ang pag-aayos ng kani-kanilang linya alinsunod sa mga pamantayan na nasa Joint Pole Agreement (JPA) ng OMECO at TelCO. Inaasahan na sa mga susunod na buwan ay mag su-submit sa OMECO ang mga nasabing TelCo ng kani-kanilang line clearing activities.'

Pag-asa (Asinan Road)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of August 15, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for August 17, 2023.'
b'16 August 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nDAHILAN: Naputol na isang Phase sa Labangan malapit sa Fil-Oil\n\nOras: 2:55 PM\n\nMGA LUGAR NA APEKTADO:\n\nFil-oil \xe2\x80\x93 Portion of Brgy.Mabini, Mapaya, Mangarin, Ilin and Ambulong Island\n\nPortion of MAGSAYSAY AREA\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\n\nKasalukuyan pong naghahanda ang Technical Team ng mga materyales na gagamitin sa pagsasaayos ng naputol na phase.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a:\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d - Caminawit, from Generic Pharmacy going to New Caminawit Port\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice.\n(Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2, \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb!\n\nBinigyan ng labing-isang (11) parangal ang OMECO bilang pagkilala ng National Electrification Administration (NEA) at Philippine Rural Electric Cooperatives Association (PHILRECA) sa katatapos na 2023 Golden Dagitab Award at PHILRECA Awards from the Wires nitong ika-9 hanggang 11 ng Agosto 2023 na ginanap sa Philippine International Convention Center (PICC), Pasay City, Metro Manila.\n\nIto ay bahagi ng NEA-EC Convergence, ang taunang pagtitipon ng 121 Electric Cooperatives sa buong bansa bilang selebrasyon ng ika-54 Founding Anniversary ng NEA, 14th National Electrification Awareness Month (NEAM), at PHILRECA Annual General Membership Meeting.\n\nNarito ang mga parangal na natanggap ng OMECO:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95 b'August 15, 2023\n\nSa pakikiisa po ng ating kooperatiba sa ginaganap na Brigada Eskwela 2023 na may temang \xe2\x80\x9cBayanihan para sa matatag na paaralan,\xe2\x80\x9d tayo po ay nagbigay ng tulong ngayong araw sa Dapi Elementary School sa pamamagitan ng ating mga kasamahan.\n\nTayo po ay kasalukuyang nag cclearing ng mga punong kahoy para sa kaligtasan ng bawat isa na tinukoy ng paaralan na may dalang panganib. Nagsagawa din po tayo ng inspection ng mga linya at nag saayos ng mga problema kagaya ng loose connection. May mga problema din kagaya ng low voltage at tayo ay nag bigay ng recommendation upang ito ay maisaayos. \n\nAng atin pong kooperatiba ay nakikiisa sa ating gobyerno upang siguraduhin ang isang ligtas at matatag na paaralan sa pag sisimula ng taong panuruan 2023.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management\n\n#BrigadaEskwela2023\n#OMECO\n#BatangMakabansa\n#BatangMakabansa'

b'August 14, 2023\n\nSa pakikiisa po ng ating kooperatiba sa ginaganap na Brigada Eskwela 2023 na may temang \xe2\x80\x9cBayanihan para sa matatag na paaralan,\xe2\x80\x9d tayo po ay nagbigay ng tulong ngayong araw sa Mamburao Central School sa pamamagitan ng ating mga kasamahan kabilang ang ating MCO Officer Mr. Norberto Inmenzo Jr. \n\nTayo po ay kasalukuyang nag cclearing ng mga punong kahoy para sa kaligtasan ng bawat isa na tinukoy ng paaralan na may dalang panganib. Nagsagawa din po tayo ng inspection ng mga linya at nag saayos ng mga problema kagaya ng loose connection. May mga problema din kagaya ng low voltage at tayo ay nag bigay ng recommendation upang ito ay maisaayos. \n\nAng atin pong kooperatiba ay nakikiisa sa ating gobyerno upang siguraduhin ang isang ligtas at matatag na paaralan sa pag sisimula ng taong panuruan 2023.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management\n\n#BrigadaEskwela2023\n#OMECO\n#BatangMakabansa\n#BatangMakabansa'

b"EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nREASON: REPLACEMENT OF PRIMARY JUMPER AT POWER TAKE-\nOFF TAYAMAAN, MAMBURAO\n\nDATE: AUGUST 9, 2023 (WEDNESDAY)\n\nTIME: From 3:00PM TO 5:00PM\n\nAREA'S AFFECTED: BUONG MAPSA AREA\n\nDetalye: Natagpuan ang wear-out primary jumper sa ating Power Take-off sa Tayamaan, Mamburao ngayong hapon. Ito ay nangangailangan ng agarang pagpapalit upang masigurado ang ligtas at maayos na pagmamahagi ng kuryente. Na agad na tutugunan ng ating Technical Team. b'09 August 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Reconfiguration of Feeders at Pag-asa Substation, Sablayan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: August 11, 2023 (BIYERNES) mula 8:00 umaga hanggang 5:00 ng hapon\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nSTA CRUZ - Quarenta, Pola, Kabangkalan, Kalibunlibunan,Pinagturilan and Mendiola\nSABLAYAN - Portion of Pagasa, Ilvita, Baloc Baloc\nPortion of Pagasa, Lagnas, San Agustin and Victoria\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of August 06, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for August 08, 2023.'
b'August 7, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86!\n\nSa pagdiriwang ng National Lineworkers\xe2\x80\x99 Appreciation Day, isang programa ang inorganisa ng OMECO upang magbigay ng pagpupugay at pasasalamat sa ating mga lineman na minsan ay hindi man nabibigyan ng pagkilala, pero sila ang mga taong nasa likod ng maliwanag na gabi na nagpapasaya sa MCOs.\n\nIto ay sinimulan sa isang virtual event na pinangunahan ng Philippine Rural Electric Cooperative Association (PHILRECA) kasama ang 121 electric cooperative sa buong bansa. Dito ay ipinamalas ang pagkilala sa papel na ginagampanan ng mga sundalo ng pailaw sa mga mensaheng binigay nina NEA Administrator, Antonio Mariano C. Almeda, PHILRECA Representative, Presly C. De Jesus,  APEC  Representative, Sergio Dagooc at PHILRECA General Manager, Atty. Janeene Depay Colingan.\n\nLubos naman ang pasasalamat ng ating General Manager, Engr. Celso D. Garcia sa sakripisyong ginagawa ng mga lineman upang magbigay ng isang kalidad at tapat na serbisyo para sa MCO. Kasabay nito ay binigyan din ng parangal ang ilan sa mga lineman bilang pagkilala sa kanilang ipinamalas na dedikasyon sa serbisyo. \n\nSamantala, isang libreng hair cut at massage, hair color, at munting salu-salo ang inihandog sa kanilang lahat matapos ang programa upang kahit sa isang simpleng paraan, ay maipadama ng OMECO ang pagmamahal at suporta sa ating mga magigiting na sundalo ng pailaw!\n\n#NationalLineworkerAppreciationDay\n#ThankALineworkerToday\n#OMECO'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6' \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac! \xf0\x9f\xab\xa1\xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f"
b"August 7, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6' \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac!\n\nPagpupugay at pasasalamat sa magigiting nating sundalo ng pailaw para sa kanilang pagsusumikap, sakripisyo, at panganib na dala sa araw-araw para lang masigurado na tuloy-tuloy ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa ating mga tahanan. \n\nMaraming salamat po, wag nating kalimutan pasalamatan ang ating mga Lineman!\n\nSaludo at pagbati sa inyong kabayanihan, OMECO Warriors of Light! \xf0\x9f\xab\xa1\xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f\n\n#NationalLineworkerAppreciationDay\n#ThankALinemanToday\n#OMECO"
b'August 4, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\n\nInimbitahan ng OMECO ngayong araw ng Biyernes ang lahat ng Telecommunication Company dito sa ating probinsya upang pag usapan ang mga issue at concern patungkol sa mga linya at poste ng TelCo na nakasabit at malapit sa mga poste ng kooperatiba.\n\nAng nasabing pagpupulong ay pinangunahan ni General Manager Engr. Celso D. Garcia kasama sina Technical Services Department Manager Engr. Lee F. Sebastian, Area Operations Department Manager Engr. John Dave C. Pascual, System Planning and Design Section Head Engr. Austin John N. Arnaiz, Power Use and Economics Section Head Engr. Vandrix O. Gaspar at mga representative ng Globe Telecom, DITO Telecom, PLDT, Ultimate Cable, at LS Cable.\n\nIlan sa mga tinalakay sa meeting ay ang mga sumusunod:\n\n1. Mga poste ng Telecom na hindi sumusunod sa itinakdang vertical at horizontal clearances.\n2. Inabandonang linya ng Telco na hindi na ginagamit o disconnected na ngunit nakasabit parin sa mga poste ng OMECO.\n3. Pag sumite ng Joint Pole Agreement (JPA) sa OMECO.\n4. Proseso ng pag-issue ng Notice to Proceed (NTP).\n\nBinigyan diin ni GM Garcia sa meeting ang mahigpit na pagsunod sa itinakdang Joint Pole Agreement (JPA) ng National Electrification Administration (NEA) upang maiwasan ang aksidente gayundin ang  malaking epekto nito sa daloy ng serbisyo ng kuryente. Ang hindi pagsunod sa mga itinakdang panuntunan sa ilalim ng JPA Contract ay maaaring maging dahilan ng pagkasunog ng distribution transformer, madalas na unscheduled power interruption lalo na sa panahong may bagyo o malakas ang hangin, at nakapagpapabagal sa pagkukumpuni ng mga linya ng koop tuwing may itinatakdang konstruksyon ang maintenance ng OMECO.\n\nMuling magpupulong ang OMECO at mga inimbitahang TelCo sa August 16, 2023 upang muling pag usapan ang mga magiging hakbang nito sa mga issue na pinag usapan ngayong araw.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of August 03, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for August 05, 2023.'

\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 2023 ang full implementation ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae-\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81.\n\nSa mga 4Ps at hindi na 4Ps, makipag-ugnayan po kayo sa inyong Municipal Link. \n\nKung kayo po ay \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae sa inyong monthly electric bill, punta na po sa pinakamalapit na OMECO Offices (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc) sa inyong lugar para mag-aplay sa Lifeline Rate Discount.\n\nMagdala lamang po ng photocopy ng valid government-issued ID (pakisama rin po ang inyong 4Ps ID), photocopy ng pinakabagong binayarang electric bill at sagutan ang ibibigay na application form.\n\nMay dagdag na requirement lamang po na Barangay Certificate of Residency at Authorization Letter kung sakaling sa asawa o kinakasama, anak, apo, magulang o lolo/lola na kasama nyo sa bahay nakapangalan ang ginagamit nyong kuntador sa inyong tahanan.\n\nPara naman po sa mga hindi 4Ps o hindi na 4Ps, may dagdag requirement po kayo na Certification mula sa inyong SWDO/MSWDO na nagsasabing ang inyong pamilya/sambahayan na may atleast 5 members ay kumikita ng nasa Php12,030 sa isang buwan. Ibig sabihin po nito ay namumuhay sa ilalim ng kasalukuyang poverty threshold ng bansa ang inyong pamilya/sambahayan.\n\nWala pong bayad ang pag-aplay at kung kayo po ay ma-approve, magkakaroon na po ng Lifeline Rate Discount ang inyong electric bill hanggat nasa Certified List po kayo ng 4Ps, kung kayo ay 4Ps. Kung kayo naman po ay non-4Ps, kailangan nyo pong mag-renew kada tatlong taon sa kadahilanang na-update po ang poverty threshold every 3 years.\n\nAplay na po kayo at makakabawas po ito sa bayarin nyo sa kuryente.\n\nPara sa buong detalye patungkol sa Lifeline Rate Discount, bisitahin ang link na ito: \xf0\x9f\x91\x89https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid0iE8gaEFXXUd8jE3p6wywiVAwBaZBRGSckuhZNCVGGSYGN4umDBTURy6PVzY3XvNJl'
