b'August 1, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\n\nNoong July 20, 2023, ipinabatid ng OMECO sa lahat na papasok ito sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) alinsunod sa Board Resolution No. 113, Series of 2023 o \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xaf\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x96 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xab\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b \xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4. Kasunod nito ay sinimulan na ng OMECO ang pagtanggap ng mga proposal para sa mga nagnanais mag-suplay ng kuryente sa ilalim ng EPSA. Makikita sa link na ito ang nasabing pabatid: https://www.facebook.com/omecofyi/posts/pfbid0cYD1P2dyZgh75KZB3wuTLzGuy2abjBeEXp5bfdfuJQgEewieLtY6iGrWN68YviNcl\n\nSa natanggap na letter ng OMECO mula OMCPC noong July 19, 2023, nakapaloob dito na sila ay tatlong buwan nang nag o-operate ng palugi. Sila din daw ay pinayuhan ng mga energy regulator na ipagpatuloy ang pag suplay ng kuryente sa OMECO ngunit sa ilalim ng EPSA na magsisimula ng July 25, 2023.\n\nNoong July 24, 2023, sinimulan na ng OMECO ang negotiation para sa EPSA kasama ang OMCPC dahil ito lamang ang available power supplier na kayang suplayan ang buong SAMARICA. Ang suplay na ito ay may kabuuang 20 megawatts at ang halaga ng kuryenteng ito ay buong babayaran ng konsyumer o yung True Cost Generation Rate (TCGR) dahil hindi ito entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno. Ibig sabihin, \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3% \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 hanggang sa matapos ang EPSA.\n\nSa mga senaryong nasa ibaba, ang SCENARIO 2 ang may pinakamababang rates per kWh. Kung ito ang scenario na ating susundin sa pag compute ng EPSA rate, makikita na tataas ng 37% ang ating nakasanayang monthly electric bill. \n\nAng mga rates at scenario na ito ay ibinatay sa availability ng Pag-asa Grain Center, Inc. (PGCI) habang may EPSA at ipinasang EPSA proposal ng OMCPC sa OMECO. Ang mga rates na ito ay maaari pang mabago depende sa magiging availability factor ng OMCPC Sablayan 5MW at Mamburao 7MW.\n\nAng OMECO ay patuloy na tatanggap ng proposal mula sa mga supplier na nagnanais mag suplay ng kuryente sa ilalim ng EPSA na makakatulong sa pagpapababa ng rates.'
b'AUGUST is the month of celebration of the \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x92. It is also the anniversary of the foundation of the \xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87 \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89, the institution that keeps OMECO and other ECs strengthened as its partners in the rural electrification program. \n \nWe are one with \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d. \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 and the government in achieving the goal of "\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4" and all objectives set for the benefit of the Filipinos.\n\n#OMECO #NEAM2023'
b'August 01, 2023\n\nPABATID\n\nNarito po ang kabuuang report mula NAPOCOR patungkol sa Technical Problem na nangyari sa Magbay Substation noong July 31, 2023. (Correction of Hotspot at Magbay Substation 10MVA Transformer) \xf0\x9f\x91\x87'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of July 30, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for August 1, 2023.'
b'Power Restoration Update\nJuly 31, 2023\n\nTuloy - tuloy ang ginagawang power restoration activities ng ating maintenance team nung nag daang Sabado at Linggo. Ilan po sa mga ito ang pag papalit ng Defective Transformer sa So. Maculbo, Fatima, Mamburao; Fix cut distribution line at So. Aluyan, Tibag, Abra De Ilog; Line clearing at So. Hinlalamay at So. Buktot, Lumangbayan, Abra De Ilog kasama ang So. Sigman, Udalo, Abra De Ilog. \n\nAng mga nabanggit na lugar ay matagumpay na narestore ang serbisyo ng kuryente at patuloy pa rin po ang power restoration activities ng ating Maintenance Team sa kasalukuyan.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA'
b'31 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n(Rescheduled due to Typhoon Egay)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Line Clearing Activity at Barangay Casague, Sta. Cruz ay naireschedule ngayong araw July 31, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: July 31, 2023 (Lunes), mula 8:00am ng umaga hanggang 5:00pm ng hapon na ipagpapatuloy sa August 1, 2 and 3, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\nSo. Cabuaga, So. Parola, So. Kabanabahan, So. Cuartero, So. Bagul, So. Kalaypayan, So. Langa Brgy. Casague, Sta. Cruz\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b'28 July 2023 | Ongoing Sangguniang Panlalawigan Session to discuss the status of power supply in the mainland Occidental Mindoro.'
b'July 28, 2023\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na magkakaroon ng PAGBABAGO sa oras ng EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION na nakatakda ngayong araw na ito. (Emergency Shutdown of OMCPC 26PL4 (13.2KV) Due to Critical SF6 Gas Pressure Level)\n\nAng EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION ay maaaring magsimula ngayong 9:00 hanggang 11:00 ng umaga.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xe2\x80\x93 From Pulang Lupa Central to San Jose District Hospital, Mang-Ipe, Bubog Area,Bagong Sikat, Bagong Silang, Bubog Relocation Site, BBraun Dialysis Center San Jose,St. Magdalene Hospital, Marsan Village, Portion of Bonifacio St., Lakandula St., Arellano St.,and Back of Rusi, Liboro St. to Lopez Bakery, Municipal Compound, MHO to ML. b'27 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Extension of PRECO Preventive Maintenance Schedule (PMS) \n\n(The load at Magbay 10MVA Substation may exceed its capability during this preventive maintenance. As a result, load shedding may be required to preserve grid stability and prevent damage to equipment.)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: July 29, 2023 (SABADO)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n10:00 A.M. to 12:15 P.M. & 4:00 P.M. to 6:15 P.M.\nSan Jose Recloser 2 - Portion of Brgy 6, Brgy. 7, Brgy. 8, Sea Breeze, Brgy. Hall San Roque\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'

b"UNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nREASON: Line troubleshooting due to frequent tripped at Mambuaro Area\nDATE: July 27, 2023 (Thursday)\nTIME: Simula 9:12am (July 26, 2023)\nAREA'S AFFECTED: Buong Mamburao Area\n\nDETALYE: Dahil sa sama ng panahon, ilang mga puno at linya ang hindi maiwasang matumba at maputol dala ng lakas ng hangin at ulan. May ilang mga poste ang natagpuan rin ng natumba. Isa na dyan ang sa Brgy. Maculbo, Fatima. Ilang Distribution Tranformer din ang natagpuang defective kagaya sa Capitol Rd. at Brgy. Tayamaan. Kasalukuyan pong tuloy-tuloy na nag ttroubleshooting ang ating maintenance team upang marestore ang kuryente sa apektadong lugar.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA"

b'Power Restoration Update:\nJuly 26, 2023\n\nOn-going Replacement of Leaning pole at Brgy. Alacaak, Sta. Cruz'
b'July 26, 2023 \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\nMagandang araw po. \n\nIpagpapatuloy po ngayong araw ang power restoration para sa mga lugar na nawalan ng ilaw dahil sa pananalasa ng Super #TyphoonEgay sa ating probinsya. \n\nNgunit kung ang lugar nyo ay kasalukuyang lubog sa baha o kaya mayroon mga linya, transformer, at poste na nasira at natumba, unawain po natin na hindi po agad ibabalik ang daloy ng kuryente para sa inyong kaligtasan.\n\nSa ngayon, ongoing po ang power restoration at kasalukuyang nagkukumpuni ng mga sirang linya, transformer, poste ang mga lineman ng OMECO.\n\nPara sa inyong mga power line concern, itawag o i-text ito sa mga hotline number ng OMECO na nasa ibaba o kaya ay i-chat sa mga facebook page ng OMECO. \n\nMaraming salamat po. Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n#EgayPH #typhoonEgay #omecopowerrestoration #OMECOHotlines'
b'July 25, 2023\n\nPower restoration update | SAMARICA AREA\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2 Energized na po ang San Jose Feeder 1 as of 7:53 PM\n\nMaraming salamat sa inyong pang-unawa. Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n#TyphoonEgay  #EgayPH  #OMECOPowerRestoration'
b'Power interruption sa SABLAYAN Area \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbb'
b'July 25, 2023 as of 7:00 PM\n\nOMECO POWER ADVISORY - SAMARICA AREA\n\nKasalukuyan pong hindi pa mapailawan ang ilang bahagi ng San Jose Feeder 2 dahil hindi po makapasok ang maintenance team dulot ng pagbaha sa lugar. Ipagpapatuloy po ang trouble shooting sa mga linyang ito kapag humupa na ang baha. \n\n*Dahilan ng Power Interruption - bumagsak na cut-out\n\nMga lugar na apektado sa San Jose Feeder 2:\n\nPortion ng La Curva, Portion ng Magbay, Bayotbot, Portion ng Camburay, Portion ng Murtha\n\n#TyphoonEgay #EgayPH #OMECO'
b'July 25, 2023 \n\nOMECO POWER ADVISORY - SAMARICA AREA\n\nSa patuloy na pagbuhos ng ulan dulot ng Super #TyphoonEgay, asahan po natin na patuloy tayong makakaranas ng unscheduled power interruption o biglaang pagkawala ng kuryente. \n\nNarito po ang ilan sa mga lugar na kasalukuyang isolated o hindi pa mapapailawan dahil nalubog sa baha ang mga outlet ng mga kabahayan:\n\nSan Jose Area\n1. Bubog Intsik\n2. Mabini Main\n3. Mangarin\n\nMAGSAYSAY AREA - hindi mapasok ng linemen dulot ng pagbaha kaya hindi po muna mapapailawan.\n\nSan Jose Feeder 1 - may trouble sa linya kaya kasalukuyang nag t-trouble shooting ang mga lineman.\n\nSa ngayon po wala pa tayong maitakdang oras o araw kung kailan mapapailawan ang mga lugar na ito pero asahan po ninyo na patuloy ang ating power monitoring at ang ating Technical Team ay naka-standby 24/7. \n\nBagamat nais nating panatilihin ang serbisyo ng kuryente, uunahin pa rin po natin ang kaligtasan ng ating warriors of light gayundin ang ating distribution facilities kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t asahan na hindi agad na maibabalik ang kuryente kung sakaling mag-brownout sa kasagsagan ng bagyo.\n\nMaraming salamat sa inyong pang-unawa. Hangad namin ang kaligtasan ng lahat.\n\nPAMUNUAN NG OMECO'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nPlease be informed that there will be a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 today, July 25, 2023 (Tuesday) from 12:00 noon onwards due to heavy rainfall brought by Typhoon Egay.\n\nHowever, those offices whose functions are involved in technical, are directed to continuously provide the necessary services needed.\n\nAll office transactions will resume tomorrow, July 26, 2023.\n\nFor reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines: \n\n24/7 EMERGENCY HOTLINE (SAMARICA): 0908-884-5539\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e! \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\n#TyphoonEgay'
b"Unscheduled power interruption\n\nREASON: Line troubleshooting due to frequent tripped at Paluan Area\nDATE: July 25, 2023 (Tuesday)\nTIME: Simula 11:15pm (July 24, 2023)  \nAREA'S AFFECTED: Simula Barangay Tubili hanggang Barangay Harrison, Paluan\n\nDETALYE: Simula 11:15pm (July 24, 2023) naireport sa atin na walang kuryente sa buong Paluan Area, at sa power restoration na ginagawa ng ating maintenance team, ilang ulit itong nagtrip. Kasalukuyan itong trinotroubleshooting ng ating maintenance team ang mga apektadong lugar upang makita at matugunan ang sanhi ng power interruption."
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of July 23, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for July 25, 2023.'
b'24 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Extension of PRECO Preventive Maintenance Schedule (PMS) \n(The load at Magbay 10MVA Substation may exceed its capability during this preventive maintenance. As a result, load shedding may be required to preserve grid stability and prevent damage to equipment.)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: July 27, 2023 (HUWEBES)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n8:00 A.M. to 10:15 A.M. & 4:00 P.M. to 6:15 P.M.\nSan Jose Recloser 3 - Brgy 4, 5, Portion of Brgy. 6; Rizal St. Public Market, Liboro St. (Mula China Bank hanggang Pandurucan), Westmin Hospital and MOMMG Medical Plaza, Portion of Bonifacio St., to Old Brgy. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'Pabatid\nJuly 24, 2023\n\nAno: Emergency Power Interruption sa Buong MAPSA Area\nKailan: July 26, 2023 simula 3:00am hanggang 5:00am\nApektadong Lugar:  Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDetalye: May natagpuan pong leaking sa ating Recloser for Paluan Area sa Brgy. Tayamaan Mamburao. Kainakailangan po itong higpitan (retighten) upang maisayos upang masiguro po ang ligtas n pamamahagi ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81.\n\nNoong July 13, 2023, nakipagpulong ang Board of Directors ng OMECO kay NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda upang pag-usapan ang estado ng suplay ng kuryente sa probinsya. Sa pagpupulong na ito, ipinagbigay alam ng administrador na matapos ang kanyang pakikipag usap kay ERC Chairperson Atty. Monalisa Dimalanta, ay hindi mabibigyan ng ERC ang SAMARICA PSA ng Provisional Authority to Operate. Ito ay dahil hindi pa natatapos ang dalawa sa tatlong component nito, ang Solar at Diesel component ng OMCPC. \n\nPara sa tuloy-tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa nasasakupan ng SAMARICA, iniutos ni NEA Admin Almeda sa ating mga Board of Director na i-withdraw sa ERC ang Joint Application para sa SAMARICA PSA upang makapasok ang OMECO sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). \n\nNoong July 18, 2023, nagpasa ang Board of Directors ng Resolution No. 112, Series of 2023 o b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81.\n\nNoong July 13, 2023, nakipagpulong ang Board of Directors ng OMECO kay NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda upang pag-usapan ang estado ng suplay ng kuryente sa probinsya. Sa pagpupulong na ito, ipinagbigay alam ng administrador na matapos ang kanyang pakikipag usap kay ERC Chairperson Atty. Monalisa Dimalanta, ay hindi mabibigyan ng ERC ang SAMARICA PSA ng Provisional Authority to Operate. Ito ay dahil hindi pa natatapos ang dalawa sa tatlong component nito, ang Solar at Diesel component ng OMCPC. \n\nPara sa tuloy-tuloy na suplay ng kuryente sa nasasakupan ng SAMARICA, iniutos ni NEA Admin Almeda sa ating mga Board of Director na i-withdraw sa ERC ang Joint Application para sa SAMARICA PSA upang makapasok ang OMECO sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA). \n\nNoong July 18, 2023, nagpasa ang Board of Directors ng Resolution No. 112, Series of 2023 o Kung sakaling ito ay ma-proseso na, buong babayaran ng konsyumer ang halaga ng kuryente o yung True Cost Generation Rate (TCGR) dahil hindi entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno ang EPSA.\n\nMakikita sa ibaba ang Board Resolution No. 112 Series of 2023, Letter of Approval ng NEA, at Board Resolution No. 113, Series of 2023. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7'

Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

As a result, load shedding may be required to preserve grid stability and prevent damage to equipment.)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: July 16, 2023 (SUNDAY)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n8:00 A.M. to 10:15 A.M. & 4:00 P.M. to 6:15 P.M.\nSan Jose Recloser 3 - Brgy 4, 5, Portion of Brgy. 6; Rizal St. Public Market, Liboro St. (Mula China Bank hanggang Pandurucan), Westmin Hospital and MOMMG Medical Plaza, Portion of Bonifacio St., to Old Brgy. Poypoy, Calintaan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. b'P A A L A L A\n\nTayo po ay magsasagawa ng Disconnection sa mga sumusunod na route sa mga petsang nakatakda para sa mga unpaid bills.\n\nJuly 13 and 14, 2023 \n\nALL STA. CRUZ AREA\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang ating mga consumer na mag settle na ng kanilang electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit po ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming Salamat at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n- OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Route of Disconnection sa SAMARICA Area para bukas, July 13, 2023. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill bago ang DEADLINE AT CUT-OFF DATE nito para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming salamat po. \n\nPlease, share.'

b'OMECO POWER UPDATE'
b'11 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: PRECO Preventive Maintenance Schedule (PMS) \n(The load at Magbay 10MVA Substation may exceed its capability during this preventive maintenance. As a result, load shedding may be required to preserve grid stability and prevent damage to equipment.)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: July 14, 2023 (BIYERNES)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\n8:00 A.M. to 10:15 A.M. & 4:00 P.M. to 6:15 P.M.\nFil-oil Recloser - Brgy. b'10 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: PRECO Preventive Maintenance Schedule (PMS) \n(The load at Magbay 10MVA Substation may exceed its capability during this preventive maintenance. b'July 10, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\n\nMagandang araw po.\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na magsasagawa ng Preventive Maintenance Schedule (PMS) ang Pag-asa Renewable Energy Corporation (PRECO) sa darating na \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf. Ibig sabihin, pansamantalang kukuha sila ng suplay ng kuryente sa OMECO para sa kanilang sariling konsumo.\n\nDahil sa pansamantalang dagdag na suplay na ito, \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf, \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 OMECO IEC Facebook Page para sa mga lugar na maaaring maapektuhan ng PMS ng PRECO.\n\nMaraming salamat po. Kalipaypayan, So. Kadaraga Barangay Casague, Sta. Cruz\n\nDetalye: Naireport po sa atin ang isang posteng natumba sa So. Kabuaya, Barangay Casague na kinakailangang mapalitan ng isang bagong poste upang maibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa naturang lugar. Ang pagpapalit po ng poste ay nakatakdang gawin bukas ng umaga para sa kaligtasan ng bawat isa.\n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

b'OMECO HOUR - MAPSA\nLive at The Bay FM 99.3\nJuly 6, 2023'
b'APLIKASYON PARA SA LIFELINE RATE DISCOUNT, KASADO NA | July 5, 2023\n\nAng pamunuan ng OMECO, katuwang ang Department of Social Welfare and Development, ay magsasagawa ng malawakang aplikasyon para sa lahat ng mga kamay-ari na napabibilang sa 4Ps at marginalized end-user na kumukunsumo ng hindi tataas ng 20kwh kada buwan. \n\nNais naming ipabatid na ang aplikasyon para sa nasabing diskwento ay gaganapin sa mga sumusunod na araw at lokasyon mula 8:00 AM hanggang 4:00 PM:\nJULY 10  \xe2\x80\x93 Magsaysay: Municipal Gymnasium\n    - Paluan: Municipal Gymnasium\nJULY 11 \xe2\x80\x93 San Jose: Town Plaza\n   - Sta. Cruz: Municipal Gymnasium\nJULY 12 \xe2\x80\x93 San Jose: Town Plaza\n  - Abra de Ilog: Municipal Gymnasium\n  - Sablayan: Municipal Gymnasium\nJULY 13 \xe2\x80\x93 Calintaan: Municipal Gymnasium\n   - Mamburao: Municipal Gymnasium\nJULY 14 \xe2\x80\x93 Rizal: Muunicipal Gymnasium\n\nKasalukuyan po ang pakikipag-ugnayan ng pamunuan sa 4Ps-DSWD ng bawat munisipyo upang mas mapadali ang proseso ng pag-aapply. Antabayanan po ang iba pang mga detalye sa mga susunod na araw ngayong linggo.'
b'5 July 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nDAHILAN: Defective Transformer at Brgy. Mabini\n\nOras: 6:39 P.M.\n\nMGA LUGAR NA APEKTADO:\n\nFil-oil \xe2\x80\x93 From Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island\nMAGSAYSAY\n\nDetalye:\nKasalukuyan pong pinapalitan ang Defective Transformer sa Brgy. Mabini. At para sa kaligtasan ng mga Lineman ng OMECO, pansamantalang mawawalan ng suplay ng kuryente ang mga lugar na apektado at muling ibabalik sa oras na matapos na ang pagpapalit ng transformer sa Mabini. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa inyong pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nPlease, share.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of July 4, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for July 6, 2023.'

pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, MCOs! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa JUNE 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 July 3 and 4, 2023, Monday and Tuesday, (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 July 5 and 6, 2023, Wednesday and Thursday, (Brgy. Hall ng Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 July 11, 2023, Tuesday, (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a) para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xe2\x80\x93 June 29 & 30, 2023\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xe2\x80\x93 July 4 & 5, 2023\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xe2\x80\x93 July 10 & 11, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb4:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7?\n\nPinagtibay at nilagdaan ang batas na ito upang masigurado ang tuluy-tuloy na serbisyo at daloy ng kuryente mula sa generasyon hanggang distribusyon ng kuryente. Pinoprotektahan nito ang ang transmission, sub-transmission, at distribution system mula sa anumang makasasagabal sa ilalim, ibabaw, at mga lugar na dinaraanan ng linya ng kuryente. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8-\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2? \n\n-Pagtatanim ng anumang uri ng halamang lumalaki o tumataas sa paligid ng linya ng kuryente o Power Line Corridor (PLC). \n-Pagtatayo ng anumang gusali o istruktura na maaaring makaapekto sa daloy ng kuryente sa loob ng PLC. \n-Pagsasagawa ng anumang uri ng delikadong gawaing maaaring makasagabal sa pagpapanatili ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n-Pagpigil sa mga otorisadong kawani o kinatawan ng tagapamahala ng mga linya ng kuryente na makapasok sa pribadong lupain upang gawin ang kanilang trabaho tulad ng maintenance, inspection, clearing activities, at iba pa. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2?\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 - arresto mayor (hanggang 6 na buwang pagkakabilanggo) o multang P50,000\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 - prison correccional (hanggang 6 na taong pagkakabilanggo) o multang P100,000\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 - prison mayor (hanggang 12 na taong pagkakabilanggo) o multang P200,000 \n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x96 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa0\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e-\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c b'Pabatid\nJune 28, 2023\n\nAno: Unscheduled Power Interruption sa buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: June 28, 2023 simula 10:05am hanggang 11:17am\n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDetalye: Nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang power interruption ang buong MAPSA Area dahil sa hindi inaasahang problema sa linya ng 69KV transmission lines ng NPC (National Power Corporation).\n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'27 June 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Line Clearing Activity at Line Clearing Activity at So. Igsuso Brgy. Tubili and So. Pamuntusin, Brgy. Harisson, Paluan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Sa darating na JUNE 30, 2023 (Biyernes), mula 8:00am ng umaga hanggang 5:00pm ng hapon na ipagpapatuloy sa susunod n linggo ng JULY 3, 4, 5, 6 AT 7\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\nBarangay Tubili at Barangay Harisson, Paluan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: For your safety, please consider our lines always energized, as we shall be putting them back into service upon expiry of the aforementioned schedule or even earlier without prior notice. (Para sa kaligtasan po ng bawat isa, mag-iingat pa rin po tayo at ituring na buhay o may dumadaloy na kuryente sa ating mga linya dahil maaring ibalik ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa oras na matapos ang mga gawain na nakasaad ng wala ng ibang abisong ilalabas)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\nNagsimula na ang Written Examination ng mga aplikante para sa ika-apat na Batch ng OMECO Barangay Electrician Association (OBEA) Accreditation ngayong araw ng Martes, June 27, 2023.\n\nAng mga aplikante ay sasailalim din sa Interview at Actual Examination ngayong linggo.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa SABLAYAN AREA para sa billing period na JUNE 2023. Makikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa SAMARICA AREA para sa billing period na JUNE 2023. Makikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. \n\nKung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO, i-message ang page na ito o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number ng OMECO.\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'
b'Ipinapabatid po na marereschedule po ang Line Clearing na nakatakda ngayong araw sa So. Calamintao, Brgy. Alacaak Sta Cruz Area sa Lunes June 19, 2023 sa kaparehong oras ng 8:00am to 5:00pm\n\nAng kaparehong power interruption po sa June 20, June 21 at June 22 ay atin din pong mararanasan sa naturang lugar bilang pagpapatuloy po sa line clearing activity.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\nR.A. 11552 AN ACT EXTENDING AND ENHANCING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE LIFELINE RATE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE, SECTION 73 OF THE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9136, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ELECTRIC POWER INDUSTRY REFORM ACT OF 2001 AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10150"\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2?\n\nAng Lifeline Rate ay tumutukoy sa subsidized na rate o diskwento na ibinibigay sa mga kwalipikadong marginalized end-users. \nAng Lifeline Discount ay isang non-cash monetary discount na ilalapat ng distribution utility sa buwanang singil sa kuryente ng mga kwalipikadong residential consumers.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4-\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5.\xf0\x9d\x97\x94. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae?\n\n1. Mga benepisyaryo ng 4Ps.\n2. Kasama sa marginalized end-user na hindi kabilang sa 4Ps beneficiaries ngunit ang income ay hindi nakapaloob sa poverty threshold ng Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA).\n3. Kwalipikadong marginalized end-user na hindi kasapi ng 4Ps at nais mag renew ng Lifeline Rate.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80?\n\n1.  Kung ikaw ay benepisyaryo ng 4Ps:\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Any valid government ID na may pirma at address\n- Certification mula sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan\n\n2. Kung ikaw ay kasama sa marginalized end-user na hindi kabilang sa 4Ps Beneficiaries ngunit ang income ay hindi nakapaloob sa poverty threshold:\n- Photocopy ng Income Tax Return o Certification mula sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan.\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Any Valid government ID na may pirma at address\n\n3. Kwalipikadong marginalized end-user na hindi kasapi ng 4PS at nais mag renew ng Lifeline Rate:\n- Photocopy ng Income Tax Return o Certification mula sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan.\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Valid government ID na may pirma at address\n- Previous Certification of Lifeline Coverage mula sa OMECO.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae-\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2?\n\n1. Mga kabilang sa 4Ps.\n2. Mga marginalized end-user na napapabilang sa poverty threshold ayon sa batayan ng Philippine Statistic Authority.\n\nKinakailangan din na:\n-Hindi tataas sa 20 kWh ang buwanang konsumo.\n-Nakapangalan sa aplikante ang metro.\n-Ang aplikante ay miyembro ng pamilya na nakatira sa bahay na sakop ng kooperatiba*\n-Ang aplikante ay nangungupahan at ang nakapangalan sa metro ay ang may-ari ng paupahan o ang dating nangungupahan.*\n-Ang bahay ay inuupahan ng beneficiary ng 4Ps Act o miyembro ng pamilya na benepisyaryo.*\n*\xf0\x9d\x98\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\xa3\xf0\x9d\x98\xaa\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xba \xf0\x9d\x98\xad\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x98\xac\xf0\x9d\x98\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x98\x90\xf0\x9d\x98\x8b \xf0\x9d\x98\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x98\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xb3\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xba \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2?\n\n1. Marginalized end-user na:\n- Nakatira sa condominium o subdivision projects.\n- Mga nag-aavail ng net metering services maliban sa mga marginalized end-user na qualified sa Sec. 15 ng Net Metering Rules.\n\n2. Mga retirado na tumatanggap ng mga pensiyon na katumbas ng o mas mataas kaysa sa naaangkop na poverty threshold.\n\n3. Mga MCOs na lumabag sa RA No. 7832 at Theft of Electric Transmission Lines/Material Act of 1994.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2?\n\nPara sa mga benepisyaryo ng 4Ps:\n- Ang validity ng Lifeline Rate ay batay sa taunang Certified List ng 4Ps Beneficiaries na ibinibigay ng DSWD.\nPara sa mga hindi kabilang sa 4Ps:\n- Ang Lifeline Rate ay VALID hanggang tatlong (3) taon mula sa petsang ipinagkaloob ang Certification na manggagaling sa Social Welfare Development Office. Maaaring magsagawa ng validation ang OMECO upang matiyak na ang consumer ay mananatiling karapat-dapat para sa Lifeline Rate'

\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac (\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86) \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2.\n\nLayunin po ng kooperatiba na subaybayan at pangasiwaan ang pag-iinstila ng mga electricians alinsunod sa batas, disiplinahin ang mga electricians sa pamantayang itinakda ng kooperatiba at Philippine Electrical Code at upang maiwasan ang "conflict of interest" sa mga empleyado.\n\nPara sa karagdagang kaalaman, mangyaring tingnan ang in-upload na OMECO Policy No. 3.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'Route of Disconnection para bukas, June 16, 2023. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle ang inyong electric bill bago ang DEADLINE AT CUT-OFF DATE nito para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming salamat po. \n\nPlease, share.'

b'June 10, 2023\n\nPABATID\n\nUNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nKAILAN: June 10, 2023 hanggang kinabukasan\n\nDAHILAN: Line Trouble\n\nMga apektadong lugar: \n\nMurtha, Batasan, Monteclaro, Manoot\n\nDetalye:\nKasalukuyang nakakaranas ng unscheduled power interruption ang mga lugar na apektado dulot ng trouble sa linya mula SJNAIHS hanggang Manoot. Muling ipagpapatuloy ang line trouble shooting ng maintenance bukas ng umaga hanggang sa mapailawan ang mga lugar na ito. Hinihiling po namin ang inyong malawak na pang-unawa.\n\nMaraming salamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nPAMUNUAN NG OMECO'
b'Sa ilalim ng Sito Electrification Program (SEP) ng National Electrification Administration (NEA) ang Sitio Mamangan at Sitio Silangan Cabacao, Abra De Ilog ay naging dalawa sa beneficiaries nito.\n\nNagsagawa po tayo ng one-stop-shop sa mga naturang sitios kung saan ang mga beneficiaries ay nakapagpre-membership seminar at naenergize ang kanilang kabahayan. \n\nNagpapasalamat po tayo sa LGU ng Abra De Ilog sa kanilang pakikiisa upang masakatuparan ang proyektong ito at ganun na rin sa Barangay Cabacao sa assistance sa mga activities na ating ginawa.\n\nTuloy tuloy po tayo sa pagtupad sa mga proyektong aprobado ng NEA upang maiparating ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa iba pang sitios na nangangailangan nito. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat'

Ilagay ang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf (ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb3\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x98\x85), \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0/\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac - ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf), \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0/\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x97/\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xac - ex. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf), \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81.\n6. Ilagay ang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2-\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3) na natanggap sa inyong registered mobile number.\n7. I- check ang inyong registered e-mail address para sa payment receipt.\n\nMaaari din magbayad over-the-counter sa lahat ng PNB Branches.\n\nTandaan: \n- Upang maipagpatuloy ang pagbayad online sa PNB, dapat meron kang bank account sa PNB.\n- Hindi na maaaring magbayad sa PNB DIGITAL APP pagkatapos ng inyong deadline date o sa araw ng inyong cut-off date.\n- Kung putol na ang inyong kuryente, hindi  na kayo maaaring magbayad sa App. Kung naputulan, pumunta agad sa opisina ng OMECO sa BILLING Section.\n\nMaraming Salamat po!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

b'42nd OMECO AGMA RAFFLE DRAW'
b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\n\nInaanyayahan po ang lahat na manood ng LIVE RAFFLE DRAW dito sa OMECO IEC FB page mamayang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf bilang pagpapatuloy ng hindi natapos na Raffle draw noong AGMA. \n\nTutok na! Para sa chance na mapabilang sa \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 na mananalo ng \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\n1. Isang beses lamang pwedeng manalo ang account ng member/consumer/owner. Kapag nabunot sa raffle, aalisin na ang kanyang pangalan sa listahan ng mga pwede pang manalo.\n\n2. b'Route of Disconnection sa San Jose Area para sa Lunes, June 05, 2023. \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang lahat na i-settle na ang inyong electric bill bago ang DEADLINE AT CUT-OFF DATE nito para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit po ng serbisyo ng kuryente. b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\n\nInaanyayahan po ang lahat na manood ng LIVE RAFFLE DRAW dito sa OMECO IEC FB page mamayang \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae, \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf bilang pagpapatuloy ng hindi natapos na Raffle draw noong AGMA. \n\nTutok na! Para sa chance na mapabilang sa \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb2\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 na mananalo ng \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\n1. Isang beses lamang pwedeng manalo ang account ng member/consumer/owner. Kapag nabunot sa raffle, aalisin na ang kanyang pangalan sa listahan ng mga pwede pang manalo.\n\n2. b'Power Restoration Update\nMay 31, 2023\n4:42pm\n\nNatagpuan ang isang nagbabagang Cut-out Assembly na agad namang pinalitan ng ating maintenance team at ilang mga punong kahoy/kawayan na natumba dahil sa sama ng panahon. Makikita sa mga larawan na kuha ng ating Maintenance Team. \n\nKami po ay humihingi ng pang-unawa at ang ating team ay ginagawa ang paraan upang matugunan ang bawat report na ating natatanggap. Para sa anuman pong concern ireport sa pamamagitan ng text o tawag sa ating hotline numbers. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat'

b"Emergency Power Interruption\nMay 31, 2023\nREASON: Sparkling Cutout Assembly near Pagbahan Bridge, Alacaak, Sta. Cruz\nDATE: May 31, 2023 (Wednesday)\nTIME: From 3:25pm to 4:25pm\nAREA'S AFFECTED: Sta. Cruz Recloser (JV Mart, Silangan, Pag-asa Hi-way, Brgy. Talabaan, Brgy. Fatima, Brgy. Balansay, So. Boning to So. Maasim, Other Portion of Sta. Cruz)\nDetalye: Nakatanggap ng report ang opisina na may nagbabagang Cutout Assembly sa isang poste malapit sa Pagbahan Bridge, Alacaak Sta. Cruz. b'Power Restoration Updates\nMay 31, 2023\n\nNatagpuan ang isang kalapating nasunog matapos dumikit sa ating linya sa So. Igsuso, Barangay Tubili na naging sanhi ng power interruption sa Paluan Area. \n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat'
b'31 May 2023 | PABATID\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat na asahan pong patuloy tayong makakaranas ng UNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION o biglaang brownout dulot ng pa-bugso bugsong sama ng panahon dala ng Bagyong Betty. \n\nMarami sa mga reported cases ng pagkawala ng ilaw ay dahil sa mga dumidikit at natumbang puno sa mga linya ng OMECO, pag tripped ng planta dahil sa mga lightning strikes, pagkasira ng mga sole at distribution transformer, naputol na mga duplex wire, at pag baha.\n\nKung kayo ay nakakaranas ng pagkawala ng kuryente, i-report ang buong detalye nito sa mga tanggapan ng OMECO, hotline numbers, o kaya dito sa OMECO IEC FB page upang matugunan ang inyong mga concerns. Asahan po na ang lahat ng inyong concern ay tutugunan at sisikaping maayos sa lalong madaling panahon. \n\nHinihiling po ng pamunuan ng OMECO ang inyong malawak na pang-unawa. Mag ingat po tayong lahat. \n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'31 May 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Fixed Cut Primary Jumper and Change Defective Cutout Assembly at 13.2KV Tieline along Labangan front of Pag-asa Grain Center, Inc.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Ngayong araw ng MIYERKULES, MAY 31, 2023 mula 02:00 P.M. hanggang 4:00 P.M.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\nSAN JOSE - From Portion of Brgy. Caminawit, Brgy. Pag-asa, Zapanta Maternity & General Hospital, Seminario Area, Malvar St., Portion of M.H. b'31 May 2023 | OMECO POWER UPDATE\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 MAPSA \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\n\nDAHILAN: Scattered Lightning Strikes due to Bad weather caused by Typhoon Betty\n\nDATE: MAY 31, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2:\n\nIlang mga lugar sa buong MAPSA Area ang nakakaranas ngayon ng no light. Ngunit lahat ng mga nareport sa huling power update kahapon ay naibalik na ang power supply. Sa kasalukuyan ito po ang mga reported na walang kuryente:\n\n1. Buong Abra De Ilog Area (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n2. Public Market to Barahan, Sta. Cruz (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n3. So. Boning, Payompon, Mamburao (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n4. Kabuuan ng Via\xc3\xb1a St. at Abeleda St. Mamburao (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n5. Tayamaan Proper (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n6. Talabaan Proper (On-going troubleshooting)\n\n7. Ilang mga Sitios ng Brgy. Udalo, Abra De Ilog - So. Bugtong, So. Bugtong Hulo, So. Kabasingan, So. Kabasingan Hulo, So. Lukutan , So. Lukutan Hulo (For Troubleshooting, hindi pa mapuntahan ang mga naturang lugar dahil sa malakas na alon upang makatawid papunta rito.)\n\n8. So. Porbis, Balansay, Mamburao (On-going Troubleshooting)\n\nDETALYE:\nHumihingi ng pang-unawa ang OMECO at paumanhin dahil sa dumaraming line troubles simula noong nakaraang araw hanggang ngayon dahil sa sama ng panahon dala ng Bagyong Betty. Kalat kalat na pag kidlat at lakas ng ulan at hangin ang atin pong nararanasan. \n\nBase sa technical report karamihan sa mga ito ay dulot ng mga natumbang puno sa linya ng OMECO, naputol na mga duplex wire, mga line trouble kung saan karamihan dito ay nasa mga malalayong lugar.\n\nHinihikayat po namin ang lahat ng consumer na i-report agad sa atin mga hotline numbers o i-chat sa OMECO IEC FB page sakaling kayo ay makaranas ng biglaang pagkawala ng suplay ng kuryente. \n\nAsahan po na ang lahat ng inyong report ay agad na ipinaaalam sa technical team ng OMECO upang ito ay mapuntahan. \n\nMaraming salamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.'

b"P A B A T I D\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\n\nREASON: Scattered Lightning Strikes due to Bad Weather\n\nDATE: May 28, 2023 (Sunday)\n\nTIME: Started at 2:00pm\n\nAREA'S AFFECTED: Sta. Cruz Recloser (JV Mart, Silangan, Pag-asa Hi-way, Brgy. Talabaan, Brgy. Fatima, Brgy. Balansay, So. Boning to So. Maasim, Other Portion of Sta. Cruz)\n\nDetalye: Nagkaroon ng mga hindi inaasahan na power interruption sa ilang lugar na nasasakupan ng Sta. Cruz Recloser simula 2:00pm. Base sa report sa ating Maintenance Team, 2:11pm natagpuan ang naputol na primary line sa Talabaan na agad namang naisaayos ng 4:53pm. Kasunod nito  ang ilan pang interruption dahil sa kalat kalat na pagkidlat dala ng sama ng panahon at may ilang mga lateral na pumutok ang fuse at nagkaroon ng epekto sa Sta. Cruz Recloser.\n\nIngat po tayong lahat at Salamat po sa inyong pangunawa\n-OMECO MAPSA Management"

I-type ang inyong \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 cellphone number (\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1).\n4. I-click ang makikitang box \xe2\x9c\x85 bilang pagsang-ayon sa terms and conditions. At i-click ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xe2\x80\x9d.\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan, maaaring tumawag sa mga hotline numbers ng OMECO.
