b'25 May 2023 | Replacement of Rotten Pole at Brgy. Pag-Asa near KKK.'
b"P A B A T I D \nUNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\nMay 25, 2023\n\nREASON: FIXED CUT PRIMARY JUMPER AND LINE CLEARING\nDATE: May 25, 2023 (Thursday)\nTIME: 8:30AM TO 10:31AM\nAREA'S AFFECTED: CABACAO, ABRA DE ILOG\n\nDetalye: 8:30am ng makatanggap ng report ang ating office na nagkaroon ng power interruption sa Cabacao Proper. Sa pag tro-troubleshoot po ng ating maintenance team, natagpuan ang mga kawayan na tumba sa ating mga primary lines na naging sanhi ng power interruption at pagkaputol ng ating primary jumper. Agad itong isinaayos ng ating team at bandang 10:25am nagkaroon ng panandaliang power interruption sa buong Abra De Ilog upang muling idugtong ang naputol na linya at 10:31am naibalik muli ang serbisyo ng kuryente sa nasabing lugar."
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \n\nNarito po ang Power Rates para sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 ng \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 12.2599/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 10.1021/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 10.4431/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 10.1910/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 12.9622/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 9.6306/kWh\n\n#OMECOPowerRateUpdate\n#OMECO'
b'P A B A T I D\n\nSa atin pong May 2023 Bill (Statement of Account) na matatanggap ngayong buwan, makikita sa bandang ibaba ang mahahalagang anunsyo ng ating Kooperatiba ngayong buwan. \n\nIsa na dyan ang gaganaping 42nd Annual General Membership Assembly (AGMA) sa May 28, 2023 (Linggo) at ang pagtaas sa singil sa kuryente kaugnay ng pag-approve ng ERC sa hiling ng NAPOCOR na dagdag sa Universal Charge Missionary Electrification (UCME) sa lahat ng consumers sa buong pilipinas.\n\nAtin pong bigyan ng pansin ang mga Notice at Announcement na ito para sa kaalaman ng bawat kasaping kamay-ari.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

Punan ang hinahanap na \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 ng inyong kuryente. At pindutin ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xe2\x80\x9d.\n3. I-type ang inyong \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 cellphone number (\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1).\n4. I-click ang makikitang box \xe2\x9c\x85bilang pagsang-ayon sa terms and conditions. At i-click ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xe2\x80\x9d.\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan, maaaring tumawag sa mga hotline numbers ng OMECO. Maaari din mag-chat dito sa ating FB page.\n\nInaasahan po namin ang inyong partisipasyon sa pagtitipong ito. Maraming salamat po!'

b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, Kamay-ari! \nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa MAY 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 June 1 and 2, 2023, Thursday and Friday, (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 June 5 and 6, 2023, Monday and Tuesday, (Brgy. Hall ng Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 June 8, 2023, Thursday (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

I-click ang makikitang box \xe2\x9c\x85bilang pagsang-ayon sa terms and conditions. At i-click ang \xe2\x80\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xe2\x80\x9d.\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan, maaaring tumawag sa mga hotline numbers ng OMECO. Cruz Area\n\nKailan: May 22, 2023 simula 5:57am\n\nApektadong Lugar: So. Dungonan Brgy. Casague, Brgy. Lumangbayan, Brgy. Barahan, Brgy. Dayap Sta. Cruz\n\nDetalye: Simula po 5:57am nag simulang makatanggap ng report tungkol sa ilang power interruption sa mga barangay na nabanggit na sakop ng Sta. Cruz Area. Patuloy po ang troubleshooting ng ating maintenance team upang matukoy at masolusyunan ang ugat ng pangyayari pong ito. At kaninang 3:04pm nakatanggap muli ng report na ang So. Kabuaya hanggang Casague ay nagkaroon din ng power interruption.\n\nSalamat po sa inyong pangunawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

At base sa troubleshooting ng ating maintenance team, natagpuan ang isang paniki na nasunog dahil sa pag dikit nito sa ating primary lines doon.\n\nStatus: Agad po itong tinanggal ng Maintenance Team at ganap na 6:51pm naibalik ang supply ng kuryente sa nasabing apektadong lugar. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

Banilad, Balansay, Mamburao\n\nDetalye: Sa pagpapatrolya ng ating Maintenance Team ay natagpuan ang napakababang linya sa Balansay Area na kung saan agad itong aayusin at mag dudulot ng panandaliang power Interruption sa apektadong lugar. b'P A B A T I D\nMay 18, 2023\n\nSa atin pong May 2023 Bill (Statement of Account) na matatanggap ngayong buwan, makikita sa bandang ibaba ang mahahalagang anunsyo ng ating Kooperatiba ngayong buwan. \n\nIsa na dyan ang gaganaping 42nd Annual General Membership Assembly (AGMA) sa May 28, 2023 (Linggo) at ang pagtaas sa singil sa kuryente kaugnay ng pag-approve ng ERC sa hiling ng NAPOCOR na dagdag sa Universal Charge Missionary Electrification (UCME) sa lahat ng consumers sa buong pilipinas.\n\nAtin pong bigyan ng pansin ang mga Notice at Announcement na ito para sa kaalaman ng bawat kasaping kamay-ari.\n\nSalamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

Makikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nPara sa inyong gabay.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\n\nPETISYON NG NAPOCOR NA DAGDAG SINGIL SA UCME SUBSIDY, INAPRUBAHAN NG ERC\n\nSa inilabas na Notice of Resolution ng Energy Regulatory Commission (ERC) noong 22 Marso 2023, nakasaad dito na inaprubahan ng ahensya ang petisyon na inihain ng NAPOCOR ukol sa pag-recover nito ng P4,877,735,633.90 na shortfall sa rural electrification subsidy noong taong 2013 at 2014.\n\nKaugnay dito, ang OMECO, kasama ang lahat ng electric cooperatives sa buong bansa, National Grid Corporation of the Philippines (NGCP) at mga private electric company, ay inatasan ng ERC na maningil ng karagdagan sa Universal Charges \xe2\x80\x93 Missionary Electrification na nagkakahalaga ng PhP 0.0433/kWh simula ngayong May 2023 billing. Ang nasabing dagdag singil ay magtatagal ng labindalawang (12) buwan o hanggang sa mapunuan ang P4.8 Billion na sinisingil ng NAPOCOR.\n\nKalakip sa post na ito ay ang kopya ng nasabing desisyon ng ERC.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'

b'BREAKING NEWS!\n\nNakakapagbigay na ng EXCESS POWER SUPPLY ang OMECO sa ORMECO (Oriental Mindoro).\n\nHangad ng OMECO ang makatulong sa ORMECO upang mabawasan ang kakulangan nito sa suplay ng kuryente. \n\nLubos din ang pasasalamat ng koop sa ORMECO dahil sa naibigay nitong excess power noong ang Occidental Mindoro ay nakakaranas ng krises sa suplay ng kuryente.'
b'Pabatid\nMay 10, 2023\nEmergency Power Interruption \n\nAno: Nagkaroon ng pansamantalang Emergency Shutdown ang OMCPC Tayamaan, Mamburao Plant ngayong 8:04pm\n\nDahilan: Defective Current Transformer due to probable loosed connection (makikita sa video na nakaupload)\n\nStatus: Ang depektibong current transformer ay kailangan mapalitan ng OMCPC upang masiguro ang ligtas na pag supply ng kuryente na kung saan nakaassist po ang ating maintenance team para sa close monitoring ng pangyayari. Sa kasalukuyan ay hindi pa po ito nakakaapekto sa atin ngunit maaari po itong maging dahilan ng power Interruption kung tataas po ang demand ng kuryente. \n\nMag lalabas po muli kami ng update sa pangyayari pong ito.\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

b'Pabatid\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\nMay 9, 2023 - May 10, 2023\n\nAno: Nagkaroon po ng ilang hindi inaasahan na power interruption sa ilang bahagi ng Paluan Area na nag simula kahapon May 9, 2023 at 3:12pm. Isa rito ay ang nakadetalye sa ibaba\n\nPower interruption start: 8:34pm\nPower restored: 7:44am (May 10, 2023)\n\nDahilan: Nagkaroon ng ilang pag ttrip sa linya dahil sa mga dumamping kawayan sa So. Kamias Barangay Marikit na trinouble shoot ng ating maintenance team at magumpay na naibalik ang kuryente sa lugar. \n \nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

Dito din itinatalakay ang mga proyektong naisakatuparan noong nakalipas na taon. Kasama sa iuulat ay ang mga mahahalagang datos na kailangan malaman ng mga member-consumer-owner/s (MCOs), gayundin ang mga programang makatutulong sa pag-unlad ng kooperatiba at mga miyembro nito. Bukod dito, magkakaroon din ng open forum at raffle draw. \n\nAng nasabing taunang pagtitipon ay gaganapin sa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xba, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2. Ito din ay maaaring matunghayan sa pamamagitan ng panonood LIVE dito sa OMECO IEC Facebook Page. Maaari din pumunta ang mga MCOs sa OMECO Area Office ng Sablayan at OMSC Mamburao Campus (para sa MAPSA Area) upang mapanood ito LIVE naman via ZOOM App.\n\nManatiling naka-antabay dito sa ating FB page para sa magiging alituntunin ng registration, raffle draw, at iba pang mahahalagang paalala patungkol sa AGMA.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'

b'May 3, 2023\n\nPAALAALA\n\nNais po naming ipabatid sa lahat po ng kasapi-kamay-ari na nasasakupan ng SABLAYAN AREA na tayo po magsasagawa ng Disconnection sa mga sumusunod na route sa mga petsang nakatakda. Pinaaalalahanan po ang lahat na magbayad na ng electric bill upang maiwasan ang pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente.\n\nMarami salamat po at ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOmeco Sablayan Management'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of May 1, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for May 3, 2023.'
b'P A A L A L A\n\nTayo po ay magsasagawa ng Disconnection sa mga sumusunod na route sa mga petsang nakatakda para sa mga unpaid bills.\n\nMAY 4, 2023 \nMAMBURAO: BRGY. PAYOMPON (30-3010)\nMAMBURAO: DAPI (30-3035)\nMAMBURAO: SEABREEZE (30-3005)\nMAMBURAO: BONING (30-3060)\n\nPinapaalalahanan po ang ating mga consumer na mag settle na ng kanilang electric bill para sa tuloy tuloy na pag gamit po ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming Salamat at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n- OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Pabatid\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\nMay 2, 2023 At May 3, 2023\n\nAno: Nagkaroon po ng ilang hindi inaasahan na power interruption sa ilang bahagi ng Mamburao at Sta. Cruz Area kahapon May 2, 2023\n\nPower interruption start: 7:25pm\nPower restored: 7:39pm\n\nPower interruption start: 7:43pm\nPower restored: 8:22pm \n\nDahilan: Nagkaroon ng loosed connection ang primary jumper ng ating linya sa So. Maculbo, Barangay Fatima Mamburao.\n\nPower interruption start: 9:20pm\nPower restored: 10:18am (May 3)\n\nDahilan: At may natagpuan pong tuko at kawayan sa ating primary lines sa So. Barayao, Balansay,Mamburao\n\nStatus: Ang trouble po na ito ay fully restored na sa kasalukuyan\n\nMangyari na lamang pong mag report agad sa ating hotline kung may hindi inaasahang power interruption sa inyong lugar\nGlobe 09166105918\nSmart 09201390462\n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'Panoorin ang naging panayam ni Anthony Taberna kay NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda kaugnay sa pagresolba sa power crisis sa Occidental Mindoro\n\nPanoorin: bit.ly/3LEXOfi\n\nvia National Electrification Administration'
b'Panoorin ang naging panayam ni Alvin Elchico kay NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda kaugnay sa pagpapatakbo ng lahat ng planta ng OMCPC \xf0\x9f\x91\x87'
b'#NEAinAction | Muling bumisita sa Occidental Mindoro ngayong araw si NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano Almeda. \n\nIbinahagi ng Administrador sa isang press conference ang mga bagong development sa pagresolba sa power crisis sa probinsya. \n\n"I want to reassure that our President and our government, both at the national and the local level have been tirelessly working to solve the power crisis. With that, I am glad to announce a very welcome development... Mr. Banzon and OMCPC have agreed to run all of its power plants to its capacity at 30 MW, which covers Occidental Mindoro\'s peaking demand. Sa madaling salita, at base sa aming kalkulasyon, sa pag-andar lahat ng planta ng OMCPC, lubos na mababawasan ang brownout sa probinsya, kung hindi man ito tuluyang matigil na," saad ng Administrador. \n\nSa naturang presscon, nilinaw din ng lider ng NEA ang mga mangyayari sa PSI power plant, pati na sa Emergency Power Supply Agreement sa DMCI Power Corporation. \n\n"Ang PSI ay magiging standby power na lamang ngayong gumagana na ang mga planta ng OMCPC... Second, the intended Emergency Power Supply Agreement with DMCI Power Corp. will not push through. Hindi na po natin itutuloy ang Emergency Power Supply Agreement para hindi magbayad ng mataas na kuryente ang mga kababayan natin dito sa Occidental Mindoro. Third, the modular generators being transported to the province originally intended to service its public schools and hospitals will be kept here in case the same should be needed," dagdag pa ng Administrador.\n\nvia National Electrification Administration'
b'ATM: NEA Admin Almeda visits the OMCPC Power Plant in Brgy. Pulang Lupa, Central, San Jose.'
b'29 April 2023 | Live Press Conference of NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano C. Almeda.'
b'HAPPENING NOW: NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano C. Almeda together with the President of OMCPC Mr. Luis Manuel T. Banson has arrived in San Jose, Occidental Mindoro.'
b'Full capacity na!\n\nDahil sa agarang aksyon ng pamahalaan, kasalukuyang full capacity na ang operasyon ng tatlong power stations ng Occidental Mindoro Consolidated Power Corporation. \n\nAng mga power stations sa Sablayan, MAPSA, at SAMARICA ay binuksan upang makapaghatid ng kuryente sa probinsya.\n\nvia Presidential Communications Office'
b'28 April 2023 | \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\n\nThe administration of President Ferdinand R. Marcos Jr. has swiftly acted on the power crisis in Occidental Mindoro with the operation of at least three power stations to provide 24-hour electricity power service in the province.\n\nIn an updated report to Malacanang on Friday, the National Electrification Administration (NEA) said NEA chief Antonio Mariano Almeda met with Luis Manuel Banzon, the owner of the Occidental Mindoro Consolidated Power Corporation (OMCPC), last April 27 to discuss the possible measures to remedy the current power crisis.\n\nDuring the meeting, the two parties agreed to run the three power stations of OMCPC to address the current power supply concerns of the province.\n\nThe power stations in the Sablayan area which has 5 megawatts (MW) capacity; Mamburao, Paluan, Sta. Cruz, and Abra de Ilog (MAPSA) which has a 7MW capacity; and San Jose, Magsaysay, Rizal, Calitaan (SAMARICA), which has 20MW capacity, will be running 24-hours to provide electricity in the areas.\n\nNEA noted that the peak demand of Occidental Mindoro Electric Cooperative Inc. (OMECO) is at 29 to 30MWs. It added that OMCPC\xe2\x80\x99s three power plants are covered by Power Supply Agreements (PSAs) with OMECO.\nThe Sablayan and MAPSA PSAs were provisionally approved by Energy Regulatory Commission (ERC) while OMCPC\xe2\x80\x99s application for the SAMARICA PSA is still being processed by OMCPC.\n\nUntil recently, the NEA said OMCPC was operating only its SAMARICA power plant at a capacity of about 7.5 MW without running its Sablayan and MAPSA power plants.\nIn the same April 27 meeting, it was determined that the apparent reason why OMCPC was not operating its Sablayan and MAPSA power plants was due to the issue of whether OMCPC\xe2\x80\x99s fuel cost is a pass-through cost.\nUpon the orders of the NEA administrator, the NEA said OMCPC agreed to run its three power facilities notwithstanding any potential financial losses to Banzon and despite not having an approved rate from the ERC for the SAMARICA power plant which would allow him to recoup his cost of operations.\n\nBanzon\xe2\x80\x99s decision was driven by his desire to help alleviate the power crisis in the province, the NEA said.\nThe NEA chief pointed out that the severe shortage of power has greatly and adversely affected the Province\xe2\x80\x99s basic services such as its public hospitals, placing lives at risk.\n\nTo date, there are no reports of blackouts in the Occidental Mindoro, the NEA noted.\n\nBefore requesting that OMCPC operate its power stations, the NEA official sought the clearance of Department of Energy Secretary Raphael Lotilla, who greenlit the arrangement.\n\nBanzon, while initially hesitant, agreed to operate the power plants situated, notwithstanding the expected financial losses, to supply residents in the province with electricity.\n\nWith all of OMCPC\xe2\x80\x99s power stations running at full capacity, it would be able to supply about 30MW to 32MWs of power to OMECO, which should result in the substantial lessening, if not complete elimination, of blackouts in the province, the NEA added.\n\nWith the changes in the action plan of the NEA chief, NEA\xe2\x80\x99s Lease and Operate Agreement (LOA) with and Power Systems Inc. (PSI) for the operation of the latter\xe2\x80\x99s power plant in the province at a capacity of 5MW will continue to operate though in a reserve capacity.\n\nThe NEA also said the intended Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) with DMCI Power Corporation will not push through and the modular generators being transported to the provinces originally intended to service its public schools and hospitals will be kept there in case the same should be needed. #\n\nvia Presidential Communications Office'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nPlease be informed that there will be NO OFFICE OPERATIONS in all OMECO OFFICES on Monday, 1 May 2023 in observance of the Labor Day.\n\nAll office transactions will resume on Tuesday, May 2, 2023.\n\nFor all emergency, reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines:\nSAMARICA 24/7 EMERGENCY: 0908-884-5539 (SMART)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255\n(GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPlease, share.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7'
b'LINEMEN IN ACTION\nGanap na 11:36am kahapon April 27, 2023 matagumpay ang naging "TRANSFER OF TAPPING POINT FROM ABRA DE ILOG FEEDER TO BACK BONE LINE OF PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL TO ENSURE UNHAMPERED POWER SUPPLY UNLESS TRANSIENT CAUSES HAPPENED"'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of April 26, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 28, 2023.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\nR.A. 11552 AN ACT EXTENDING AND ENHANCING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE LIFELINE RATE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE, SECTION 73 OF THE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9136, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ELECTRIC POWER INDUSTRY REFORM ACT OF 2001 AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10150"\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2?\n\nAng Lifeline Rate ay tumutukoy sa subsidized na rate o diskwento na ibinibigay sa mga kwalipikadong marginalized end-users. \n\nAng Lifeline Discount ay isang non-cash monetary discount na ilalapat ng distribution utility sa buwanang singil sa kuryente ng mga kwalipikadong residential consumers.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4-\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5.\xf0\x9d\x97\x94. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae?\n\n1. Mga benepisyaryo ng 4Ps.\n2. Kasama sa marginalized end-user na hindi kabilang sa 4Ps beneficiaries ngunit ang income ay hindi nakapaloob sa poverty threshold ng Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA).\n3. Kwalipikadong marginalized end-user na hindi kasapi ng 4Ps at nais mag renew ng Lifeline Rate.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80?\n\n1.  \xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Any valid government ID na may pirma at address\n- Certification mula sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan\n\n2. \xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xb3\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d-\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan.\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Any Valid government ID na may pirma at address\n\n3. sa DSWD na inissue sa loob ng nakaraang anim na buwan.\n- Application Form\n- Pinakabagong electric bill o statement of account\n- Valid government ID na may pirma at address\n- Previous Certification of Lifeline Coverage mula sa OMECO.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a:\n-Hindi tataas sa 20 kWh ang buwanang konsumo.\n-Nakapangalan sa aplikante ang metro.\n-Ang aplikante ay miyembro ng pamilya na nakatira sa bahay na sakop ng kooperatiba.\n-Ang aplikante ay nangungupahan at ang nakapangalan sa metro ay ang may-ari ng paupahan o ang dating nangungupahan. Magpakita lamang ng proof of residence gaya ng Contract of Lease.*\n-Ang bahay ay inuupahan ng beneficiary ng 4Ps Act o miyembro ng pamilya na benepisyaryo. Magpakita lamang ng proof of residence gaya ng Contract of Lease.*\n\n*\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x98\xac\xf0\x9d\x98\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\xba\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x98\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\xb7\xf0\x9d\x98\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\xb3\xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xb5-\xf0\x9d\x98\xaa\xf0\x9d\x98\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x98\x90\xf0\x9d\x98\x8b \xf0\x9d\x98\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x98\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xb3\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xba \xf0\x9d\x98\x8a\xf0\x9d\x98\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\xb3\xf0\x9d\x98\xb5\xf0\x9d\x98\xaa\xf0\x9d\x98\xa7\xf0\x9d\x98\xaa\xf0\x9d\x98\xa4\xf0\x9d\x98\xa2\xf0\x9d\x98\xb5\xf0\x9d\x98\xa6.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2?\n\n1. Marginalized end-user na:\n- Nakatira sa condominium o subdivision projects.\n- Mga nag-aavail ng net metering services maliban sa mga marginalized end-user na qualified sa Sec. 15 ng Net Metering Rules.\n\n2. Mga retirado na tumatanggap ng mga pensiyon na katumbas ng o mas mataas kaysa sa naaangkop na poverty threshold.\n\n3. Mga MCOs na lumabag sa RA No. 7832 at Theft of Electric Transmission Lines/Material Act of 1994.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2?\n\nPara sa mga benepisyaryo ng 4Ps:\n- Ang validity ng Lifeline Rate ay batay sa taunang Certified List ng 4Ps Beneficiaries na ibinibigay ng DSWD.\n\nPara sa mga hindi kabilang sa 4Ps:\n- Ang Lifeline Rate ay VALID hanggang tatlong (3) taon mula sa petsang ipinagkaloob ang Certification na manggagaling sa Social Welfare Development Office. Maaaring magsagawa ng validation ang OMECO upang matiyak na ang consumer ay mananatiling karapat-dapat para sa Lifeline Rate'
b'27 Abril 2023 | Upang maiwasan ang mga haka-haka sa bilang ng mga consumer ng OMECO, nais linawin ng pamunuan na HINDI LIBRE ANG KURYENTE sa mga susunod na buwan. \n\nAng 5MW na i-susuplay ng Power Systems, Inc. (PSI) lamang ang kuryenteng HINDI BABAYARAN ng consumer sa loob ng dalawang (2) buwan dahil ito ay buong babayaran ng National Government sa pamamagitan ng National Electrification Administration (NEA).\n\nIbig sabihin, hindi isasama sa bill ng kuryente ng consumer ang kuryente na manggagaling sa PSI.\n\nIpinapaalala din ng OMECO sa lahat ng consumer na suriin muna ang mga nababasa online kung ito ay may katotohanan. Maging matalino, mapanuri at responsable tayo sa ating mga pino-post online. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of April 25, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 27, 2023.'
b'OMECO POWER ADVISORY | REVISED ROTATIONAL POWER SUPPLY SCHEDULE FOR APRIL 27, 2023 (THURSDAY)\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat ng MCO na ang mga schedule na nasa ibaba ay MGA ORAS NA MAYROON KAYONG SUPLAY NG KURYENTE. \n\n*Ang 12MW na sinusuplay ng OMCPC ay magsisimula na ng 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 5:00 ng hapon kada araw. Samantala, kapag OFF-PEAK o sa oras na mababa ang demand sa kuryente ng Oriental Mindoro saka lamang nakakakuha ng EXCESS POWER SUPPLY mula ORMECO. \n\n*Ang PSI ay inaasahang mag su-suplay ng 5MW sa OMECO sa 29 Abril 2023, 12:00 ng hapon.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x98: KAKULANGAN SA SUPLAY NG KURYENTE.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83:\n\n12:30 AM TO 4:00 AM\nSAN JOSE \xe2\x80\x93 From Pulang Lupa Central to San Jose District Hospital, Mang-Ipe, Bubog Area,Bagong Sikat, Bagong Silang, Bubog Relocation Site, BBraun Dialysis Center San Jose,St. Magdalene Hospital, Marsan Village, Portion of Bonifacio St., Lakandula St., Arellano St., and Back of Rusi\nSABLAYAN - Brgy. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (SAMARICA area) para sa APRIL 2023 Billing! \n\nMagsaysay Collection Center \xe2\x80\x93 May 2 & 3, 2023\nCalintaan Collection Center \xe2\x80\x93 May 5 & 8, 2023\nRizal Collection Center \xe2\x80\x93 May 9, 10 & 11, 2023\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \n\nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'
b'LINEMEN IN ACTION\nAPRIL 26, 2023\n\nON-GOING TRANSFER OF TAPPING POINT FROM ABRA DE ILOG FEEDER TO BACK BONE LINE OF PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL TO ENSURE UNHAMPERED POWER SUPPLY UNLESS TRANSIENT CAUSES HAPPENED.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of April 24, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 26, 2023.'
b'25 Abril 2023 | Dumating sa San Jose, Occidental Mindoro ngayong araw si NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano C. Almeda upang ilahad at talakayin ang kanyang mga plano para malutas ang krisis sa suplay ng kuryente sa probinsya alinsunod sa direktiba ng Administrasyong Marcos. Siya ay sinalubong ni General Manager Engr. Celso D. Garcia kasama ang ilan sa mga local officials ng lalawigan.\n\nSa pagdating ng administrator sa OMECO, una n\xe2\x80\x99yang tinalakay ang pagpapaandar ng 5MW Gensets ng Power Systems, Inc. (PSI) sa Pulang Lupa, Central. Napagkasunduang mag su-suplay ang PSI sa OMECO sa loob ng dalawang buwan upang unti unting mabawasan ang rotational brownout sa lalawigan. \n\nAyon sa pinirmahang kontrata ng PSI at NEA, magsisimula nang mag suplay ang PSI sa OMECO sa darating na 29 Abril 2023, araw ng Sabado, ganap na 12:00 ng hapon. Ang kuryenteng i-susuplay ng PSI ay buong babayaran ng NEA at hindi sisingilin sa mga kamay-ari ng OMECO. Ayon sa NEA, ang gagamiting pondo para rito ay bahagi ng calamity fund ni Pangulong Ferdinand \xe2\x80\x9cBong-Bong\xe2\x80\x9d Marcos.\n\nDagdag pa rito, magpapadala din ang NEA sa lalawigan ng mga modular gensets na ginamit noong 2013 Mindanao Power crises na s\xe2\x80\x99yang ilalaan sa mga hospital at government establishment upang hindi maantala ang operasyon nito.\n\nSinisimulan na din ng NEA at OMECO ang pakikipag ugnayan sa DMCI Power Corporation gayundin sa iba pang power supplier na nagnanais maging parte ng EPSa at makatulong sa paglutas sa problema sa suplay ng kuryente.\n\nLubos na nagpapasalamat ang pamunuan ng OMECO kay NEA Admin Almeda dahil sa ginawa nitong intervention sa problema sa suplay ng kuryente sa probinsya.'
b'P A B A T I D\n\nMagandang araw, Kamay-ari! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa April 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 May 2 and 3, 2023 (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 May 4 and 5, 2023 (Brgy. Hall ng Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 May 9, 2023 (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'

b'HAPPENING NOW: Arrival of NEA Administrator Antonio Mariano C. Almeda, Deputy Administrator Ernesto O. Silvano, Jr. and Deputy Administrator Omar M. Mayo at San Jose, Occidental Mindoro to discuss the power situation in the province.'
b'April 24, 2023 | OMECO Technical Team conducted a site inspection today, at Power Systems, Inc. (PSI) Power Plant located at Brgy. Pulang Lupa, Central to ensure its capability to supply before its commercial operation.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of April 23, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 25, 2023.'
b'PABATID\nApril 24, 2023\nOMECO MAPSA Area\n\nAno: Unscheduled Power Interruption sa Tatlong Barangay ng Sta. Cruz\n\nDahilan: Matapos ang masinsinang trouble shooting upang mahanap ang pinag mumulan ng problema, may natagpuang sirang poste malapit sa Barangay Hall ng Casague, Sta. Cruz\n\nKailan: April 24, 2023 (Lunes) simula 7:57am\n\nApektadong Lugar: Barangay Alacaak, Barangay Kurtinganan, Barangay Casague ng Sta. Cruz\n\nStatus: Kasalukuyan po itong isinasaayos ng ating Maintenance Team\n\nSalamat po sa inyong pangunawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'April 24, 2023 | Interview of ABS-CBN and GMA News with General Manager Engr. Celso D. Garcia regarding power supply crises in Occidental Mindoro.'
b'OMECO POWER ADVISORY | ROTATIONAL POWER SUPPLY SCHEDULE FOR APRIL 24, 2023 (MONDAY)\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat ng MCO na ang mga schedule na nasa ibaba ay MGA ORAS NA MAYROON KAYONG SUPLAY NG KURYENTE. \n\n*Ang 12MW na sinusuplay ng OMCPC ay magsisimula na ng 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 5:00 ng hapon kada araw. b'Muling nagkita-kita sa kanilang kauna-unahang pagpupulong ngayong linggo (April 18-20, 2023) ang mga Barangay MCO Chairmen sa bawat Distrito ng SAMARICA Area matapos manumpa noong February 11, 2023 bilang katuwang ng kooperatiba sa mga programang pang-elektripikasyon.\n\nTampok sa nasabing distritong pagpupulong ang mga napapanahong usapin kagaya ng:\n1. Current Power Supply and Demand\n2. Effects of Prolonged Rotational Brownout to MCOs and other Stakeholders of the community \n3. Update on the Subsidy from NPC\n4. Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) \n5. Increase of Generation Rate due to EPSA\n6. Recent engagement of OMECO with Media Sectors and NGA/PGO/LGUs\n7. Actions taken by the Cooperative \n\nDinaluhan ang nasabing pagpupulong ng mga Board of Directors na kumakatawan sa bawat distrito na sina Dir. Myrna G. Magno ng Magsaysay, Dir. Eleanor S. Costibolo ng San Jose at Dir. Ronnel P. Mendoza ng Rizal at Calintaan. Binigyang oras din ng mga Department Managers ang aktibidad upang makapagbigay ng impormasyon at paglilinaw sa ilang espekulasyong kumakalat hinggil sa power crisis sa lalawigan.'
b'OMECO POWER ADVISORY | ROTATIONAL POWER SUPPLY SCHEDULE FOR APRIL 22, 2023 (SATURDAY)\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat ng MCO na ang mga schedule na nasa ibaba ay MGA ORAS NA MAYROON KAYONG SUPLAY NG KURYENTE. \n\n*Ang 12MW na sinusuplay ng OMCPC ay magsisimula na ng 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 5:00 ng hapon kada araw. b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 as of April 18, 2023 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 20, 2023'

Karyandangan, and Occidental Mindoro Provincial Hospital\nABRA AREA\n\nFor your information & guidance.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac-\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\n\nMuling kukuha ang OMECO ng EXCESS POWER SUPPLY mula ORMECO simula ngayong araw ng Miyerkules, 19 Abril 2023 bilang parte ng Emergency Power Supply Agreement (EPSA) na inaprubahan ng Department of Energy (DOE). \n\nBilang paglilinaw, ang excess power supply mula sa ORMECO ay True Cost Generation Rate o buong babayaran ng konsyumer ang halaga ng kuryente mula Oriental dahil hindi ito entitled sa subsidiya mula gobyerno. Makikita ito sa inilabas na Certification o COE-CSP-2023-03-017 mula DOE. Ang estimated na halaga ng magiging effective rate kasama ang kuryente mula ORMECO ay maaaring aabutin ng PhP 18.71/kWhr o higit pa sa susunod na Billing Period ng taong ito.\n\nAng suplay na ito ay may kabuuang 4MW hanggang 6MW o maaaring mas mababa depende sa EXCESS SUPPLY ng ORMECO. Ang oras ng pag-suplay nito ay walang katiyakan kung anong oras maibibigay sa loob ng buong araw dahil ito ay naka-depende sa magiging EXCESS POWER SUPPLY ng Oriental, Mindoro. \n\nIto ang pinakamabilis na solusyon ng pamunuan ng OMECO upang unti-unting madagdagan ang oras na may kuryente kada araw.\nSamantala, patuloy parin ang pakikipag usap ng pamunuan sa mga posibleng maging supplier para sa EPSA na magtatagal lamang ng isang taon. Ang EPSA ay agad na i-teterminate sakaling mabigyan na ng Provisional Authority ang PSA ng SAMARICA.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Narito po ang \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 sa SABLAYAN AREA para sa billing period na APRIL 2023. Makikita dito ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 at \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 ng mga nasabing lugar. Kung sakali na kayo ay hindi nakatanggap ng Statement of Account (SOA) o Reading Receipt sa araw na kayo ay re-readingan, agad itong ipagbigay alam sa tanggapan ng OMECO o kaya ay itawag sa mga hotline number sa ibaba:\n\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPara sa inyong gabay.'

Asahan na ito magdudulot ng pagkaantala sa pagpapailaw sa mga lugar na naka-schedule ng 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM."

b'Pabatid\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\nApril 14, 2023\n1:00pm\n\nAno: Nagkaroon po ng hindi inaasahang Total Trip ang Transmission ng 69KV line of National Power Corporation (NPC) ganap na 12:25pm na nagpapadaloy ng supply ng kuryente sa buong MAPSA Area. \n\nStatus: Kasalukuyan pong nag troubleshooting upang mahanap at matugunan ang pinagmulan ng problema. \n\nSalamat po sa pang-unawa at ingat po tayong lahat\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'

b'OMCPC, MULING MAGBABAWAS NG ISANG UNIT NG GENSET\n\nGanap na 2:54 PM ngayong hapon nang matanggap ng OMECO ang sulat mula sa pamunuan ng OMCPC tungkol sa muling pagbabawas ng isa pang unit ng kanilang planta dahil sa wala pa umano silang natatanggap na subsidy mula sa NAPOCOR. May kabuuan na lamang 7.5MW na suplay ng kuryente ang maisusuplay ng OMCPC sa OMECO simula mamayang alas-dose (12:00) ng madaling araw.\n\nDahil sa pagbabawas na ito, magkakaroon na lamang ng apat (4) na oras na may kuryente kada araw sa ilalabas na panibagong schedule ng rotational power supply.'
b'April 12, 2023 | Fixing cut primary line at Aroma Beach San Roque.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf | \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\n\nNagpatawag ng emergency meeting ang Provincial Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Council (PDRRMC) sa pangunguna ni Governor Eduardo Gadiano ngayong araw ng martes, 11 Abril 2023 upang talakayin ang pag deklara ng state of calamity sa buong probinsya dahil sa kakulangan ng suplay ng kuryente.\n\nTinalakay sa pagpupulong ang naging epekto ng power outages sa sangay ng turismo, negosyo, agrikultura, kalusugan, at edukasyon na kanya kanya naman ipinaliwanag ng bawat sektor na naimbitahan. Kasama din sa mga napag usapan ang pag gamit ng solar sa bawat government offices sa buong probinsya upang makabawas sa tumataas na demand ng kuryente.\n\nSa huli, tuluyan na ngang idineklara ni Governor Gadiano ang state of calamity sa buong probinsya ng Occidental Mindoro.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 as of April 10, 2023 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for April 12, 2023.'

b'BLACK SATURDAY: In the Tomb\n\nFor you know that it was not with perishable things such as silver or gold that you were redeemed from the empty way of life handed down to you from your ancestors, but with the precious blood of Christ, a lamb without blemish or defect.\n\n#BlackSaturday'

b'PANOORIN: Antabayanan ang Live interview ngayon ni Kabayan Noli De Castro kay Dr. Eleanor S. Costibolo (BOD President).\n\nNarito ang link ng interview:\nhttps://www.youtube.com/live/jj2XBLkBB5g?feature=share'
b'SENATE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY HEARING | April 4, 2023 (1:00 P.M.)\n\nNagpatawag ng emergency hearing si Senator Raffy Tulfo kaninang 1:00 ng hapon upang pag usapan ang mga magiging hakbang upang ma-solusyunan ang problema sa kakulangan ng suplay ng kuryente sa ating probinsya. Kabilang sa mga dumalo ay ang OMECO, OMCPC, NEA, DOE, DBM, ERC, NAPOCOR, at ilan sa mga local leaders.\n\nIsa sa inihaing solusyon ay ang muling pagpapautang ng NEA sa OMECO upang matulungan ang OMCPC na makabili ng kanilang fuel. Agad naman nagpatawag ng emergency board meeting si NEA Project Supervisor Cesar E. Faeldon upang pag-usapan ang nasabing suhestiyon.\n\nSamantala, ipinaalam din ng OMECO sa nasabing hearing na nag request ang koop sa DOE ng Certificate of Exemption para sa pag conduct ng CSP at payagan ang OMECO na mag conduct ng 17MW Emergency Power Procurement upang tuloy-tuloy ang suplay ng kuryente. \n\nMuling magpapatawag ng pagpupulong ang senate pagkatapos ng mahal na araw.'

b'April 2, 2023\n\nAng atin pong election ay matagumpay nang nagtapos sa araw na ito. Ikinagagalak po nating ipabatid ang naiproklamang Board of Director ng Sta. Cruz District, Director Francis Jay A. Servando at Director Myrna G. Magno ng Magsaysay District.\n\nMaraming salamat po sa lahat ng nakibahagi!'
b'April 2, 2023\n\nOn-going Board of Director Election\nLibrary of Sta. Cruz Central School \nCome and Join us!'

Updated Resume\n2. Application Letter (Indicating position applying for)\n3. Copy of Birth Certificate\n4. Certificate of employment (If with previous employment)\n5. Copy of Transcript of records / Diploma (for Data Gatherer Applicants)\n6. Photocopy of Driver's License \n \nOnly complete requirements will be entertained.\nInterested/qualified applicants may submit their application at HRAD/PMODS Office (San Jose) or email us at pmods0325hrd@gmail.com on or before April 6, 2023 not later than 5'o clock in the afternoon."

b'Pabatid\nMarch 31, 2023\nEmergency Power Interruption\n\nAno: Unscheduled power interruption sa buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: March 31, 2023 simula 8:23am\n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDahilan: Nagkaroon po ng hindi inaasahang problema ang 69KV Transmission Lines ng National Power Corporation na katulong natin sa pag hahatid ng kuryente sa buong MAPSA Area.\n\nStatus: Kasalukuyan po itong isinasaayos upang maibalik ang Distribution ng kuryente sa MAPSA Area. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\n\nMagandang araw, Kamay-ari! \n\nNarito ang mga petsa ng koleksyon para sa ating mga collection centers (MAPSA Area) para sa March 2023 Billing! \n\nAbra De Ilog \xe2\x80\x93 March 31 and April 3, 2023 (Brgy. Hall ng Brgy. Tibag)\n\nSta. Cruz \xe2\x80\x93 April 4 and April 5, 2023 (Brgy. Hall ng Poblacion 2)\n\nPaluan \xe2\x80\x93 April 11, 2023 (Collection Center, Brgy. 6)\n\nAng atin pong mga collection centers ay bukas mula 8:00 ng umaga hanggang 3:00 ng hapon.\n\nMagbayad ng ating bill bago ang deadline date upang maiwasan ang surcharge at pagkaputol ng serbisyo ng kuryente. \nPunta na sa mga collection center na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nInaanyayahan po ang lahat ng kamay-ari ng OMECO mula sa munisipalidad ng MAGSAYSAY at STA. CRUZ na makibahagi sa paparating na eleksyon ng Board of Director sa April 2, 2023, alas-otso ng umaga (8:00 A.M.)\n\nNarito po ang mga Board of Director Candidate kada munisipyo:\n\nMAGSAYSAY \xe2\x80\x93 Ms. Myrna G. Magno (Lone Candidate)\nSTA. CRUZ \xe2\x80\x93 Mr. Francis Jay V. Servando (Lone Candidate)\nABRA DE ILOG - NO CANDIDATE\n\nAng eleksyon ng board of director para sa Magsaysay ay gaganapin sa Magsaysay Central School samantala, ang eleksyon naman para sa Sta. Cruz ay gaganapin sa Library ng Sta. Cruz Central School.\n\nNarito po ang ilan sa mga paalala patungkol sa nasabing eleksyon:\n\n1. Ang mga makakaboto sa eleksyon at makakasama sa masterlist of voters ay yaong nakabitan ng metro hanggang January 2, 2023.\n2. Wala pong proxy voting. Ang maaari lamang pong bumoto ay ang rehistradong kasapi o di kaya ay ang legal na asawa;\n3. Ang masterlist of voters po ay nakapaskil na sa inyong mga barangay hall upang ito ay masuri ng mga kasapi.\n\nPara sa karagdagang impormasyon, maaari pong pumunta sa opisina ng OMECO o tumawag sa mga sumusunod na hotline numbers na bukas simula alas-otso (8:00 A.M.) ng umaga hanggang alas-singko (5:00 P.M.) ng hapon:\n\nMAGSAYSAY \xe2\x80\x93 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE) \nSTA. CRUZ: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nOMECO MANAGEMENT'
b'On Site Pre-Membership Seminar at Brgy. Claudio Salgado Sablayan, Occ. Mindoro\n\nTayo po ay nagsagawa ng On-Site Pre-Membership Seminar (PMS) noong March 29, 2023 bilang tugon sa request ng Brgy. Claudio Salgado, Sablayan. \nAng PMS ay isang  requirements for "New Connection" at "Change Name" na  isinasagawa tuwing pangalawa at huling Biyernes ng buwan sa ating opisina ng OMECO  Sablayan.\n\nBukas po ang ating opisina sa bawat request ng ating mga Barangay na nag nanais ding maisagawa ang On-site Pre Membership Seminar sa inyong Barangay.\n\nMaaari po kayong makipag-ugnayan sa ating opisina kung tayo po ay may mga  request o ibang concerns.\n\nIngat po tayong palagi.\n\nMula sa pamunuan ng OMECO Sablayan.'
b'March 29, 2023\nOMECO Sablayan Branch Office conducted Symposium at Claudio Salgado National High School for Grade 10 students .\nThis is to strengthen the involvement and concern of its Member-Consumers  as well as those users of electricity.\nThank you very much Madam Norma B.Taboy Principal III.'
b'March 29, 2023\nParticipation in Symposium for BSBA-Operation Management Students\n\nAng atin pong tanggapan sa OMECO MAPSA ay nakatanggap ng imbitasyon upang makilahok at maging resource speakers sa programang Symposium for BSBA-Operations Management Students sa Occidental Mindoro State College-Mamburao Campus Brgy. Tayamaan, Mamburao. \n\nBilang tugon, tayo po ay nakiisa upang maipaliwanag sa ating mga Students ang patungkol sa requested nilang Topic, \xe2\x80\x9cOrganizational Challenges and Quality Services of Occidental Mindoro Electric Cooperative, Inc.\xe2\x80\x9d upang mapalawak at makapag bigay ng impormasyon sa operations management na ating ginagawa sa ating kooperatiba na makakatulong sa pagpapalawak ng kanilang kaalaman sa Services industry particularly sa Distribution Utility Service. \n\nMalugod po kaming nagpapasalamat sa kanilang Program Head, Dr. Judy Catalo at sa mga organizers ng event na ito ay naging matagumpay. \n\nAng tanggapan po ay bukas sa mga kahintulad na imbitasyon at maari lamang pong makipag ugnayan para sa schedule po nito.\n\nSalamat po at ingat tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

b'March 25, 2023 | Ongoing construction of 69KV LINES along National Highway Brgy. Labangan, San Jose.'
b'NOTICE TO THE PUBLIC\n\nAng pamunuan ng OMECO ay mariing kinokondena ang mga banta ng karahasan at pananakot laban sa mga empleyado nito sa social media. \n\nHindi kami mag aatubiling sampahan ng karampatang kaso ang sinumang  mag-uupload at mag-seshare ng mga pananakot at pagbato ng masasakit na salita laban sa mga empleyado. \n\nMaging matalino, mapanuri at responsable po tayo sa ating mga pino-post online.\n\nPAMUNUAN NG OMECO'
b'March 25, 2023\n\nIngat po sa mga warriors of light ng OMECO na kasalukuyang nagsasagawa ng pagsasaayos sa 69KV lines at poles sa kahabaan ng Brgy. Labangan. Saludo po kami sa inyong dedikasyon sa trabaho. \xf0\x9f\x92\xa1'

Lucia\nSAN JOSE \xe2\x80\x93 La Curva, Magbay, Camburay, San Isidro, Murtha, Batasan, Monteclaro and Bayotbot and Manoot\nMAMBURAO \xe2\x80\x93 Rizal St.; Kanluran Public Market, Brgy.7, San Jose St.; Brgy. 2, Purok 45, Portion of Brgy. 7, Globe Office,Capitol Road; Capitol Bldg., Pag-asa, So. Dapi, So. Maligaya, Brgy. Road, Brgy. 9 Dike and INC going to Seaside\nSTA CRUZ - Quarenta, Pola, Kabangkalan, Kalibunlibunan, Pinagturilan and Mendiola\nSABLAYAN - Portion of Pagasa, Ilvita, Baloc Baloc\nPortion of Pagasa, Lagnas, San Agustin and Victoria\nPALUAN Area\n\nAng schedule na ito ay maaaring mas mapahaba depende sa magiging demand sa suplay ng kuryente. Kasalukuyang inaabot na ng 28-29MW ang demand sa kuryente samantala, ang suplay ng kuryente ay inaabot lamang ng 7-14MW mula OMCPC dahil sa itinatakda nitong Fuel Management. Hindi din tuloy-tuloy na nakakakuha ng excess supply ng kuryente ang OMECO sa ORMECO. \n\nPatuloy naman ang pakikipag usap at pakikipag ugnayan ng pamunuan ng OMECO sa mga concerned agencies gaya na lamang ng national at local government upang masolusyunan na ang problema sa suplay ng kuryente na siyang nangangailangan ng intervention ng mga ito.\n\nFor your information and guidance.\n\nOMECO MANAGEMENT'

Balansay, So. Buning to So. Maasim\nMAMBURAO \xe2\x80\x93 Brgy. Tayamaan; So. Bunot, GCFI, Brgy. San Luis; So. Banakan and Brgy. Tangkalan; So. Karyandangan, and Occidental Mindoro Provincial Hospital\nABRA AREA\nSABLAYAN - Yapang, Tuban, Malisbong, Ligaya and Burgos, Batong Buhay, Emilio Aguinaldo, Tagumpay, Paetan, Ibud, San Vicente, So. Tulaong and San Francisco\n\nAng schedule na ito ay maaaring mas mapahaba depende sa magiging demand sa suplay ng kuryente. Kasalukuyang inaabot na ng 28-29MW ang demand sa kuryente samantala, ang suplay ng kuryente ay inaabot lamang ng 7-14MW mula OMCPC dahil sa itinatakda nitong Fuel Management. Hindi din tuloy-tuloy na nakakakuha ng excess supply ng kuryente ang OMECO sa ORMECO. \n\nPatuloy naman ang pakikipag usap at pakikipag ugnayan ng pamunuan ng OMECO sa mga concerned agencies gaya na lamang ng national at local government upang masolusyunan na ang problema sa suplay ng kuryente na siyang nangangailangan ng intervention ng mga ito.\n\nFor your information and guidance.\n\nOMECO MANAGEMENT'
b'MARCH 24, 2023 | Panoorin at pakinggan ng mabuti ang naging panayam ni Sir Mariboy Ysibido (Aksyon Balita sa Umaga) kay OMECO BOD President Dr. Eleanor S. Costibolo kaninang umaga upang sagutin ang mga isyu at haka-haka kaugnay ang kuryente.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 (as of March 22, 2023) & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 for March 24, 2023.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\n\nIn view of the simultaneous celebration of Women\xe2\x80\x99s Month and the 49th Anniversary of OMECO, our area offices (Sablayan and MAPSA) will be CLOSED on MARCH 24, 2023 (FRIDAY) while our San Jose Main Office will remain OPEN on Friday UNTIL 12 noon ONLY.\n\nRegular office transactions in all OMECO offices will resume on Monday, March 27, 2023.\n\nFor all emergency, reports and other concerns, you may call or text our hotlines:\n\nSAMARICA 24/7 EMERGENCY: 0908-884-5539 (SMART)\nSAMARICA: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\nSABLAYAN: 0951-011-1454 (SMART); 0906-490-0255 (GLOBE)\nMAPSA: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\nPlease, share.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\n\nIpinapaalam po ng pamunuan ng OMECO sa lahat ng kamay-ari nito na kanselado o hindi matutuloy ang nakatakdang Pre-Membership Seminar bukas, araw ng biyernes, 24 Marso 2023, sa MAPSA Area office at San Jose Main Office. \n\nAng nasabing pre-membership seminar para sa mga nabanggit na opisina ay itutuloy sa Marso 27, 2023, araw ng lunes sa ganap na alas-otso (8:00) ng umaga. Samantala, ang pre-membership seminar naman para sa Sablayan Area office ay gaganapin sa ika-31 ng Marso 2023.\n\nMaraming Salamat po.'
b'P A B A T I D\nMARCH 23, 2023\n\nAno: EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nKailan: MARCH 23, 2023 SIMULA NG 8:10AM\n\nApektadong Lugar: BUONG MAPSA Area\n\nDahil sa pag taas ng demand ang ating power supply na nanggaling sa ORMECO ay nagkakaroon na rin ng kakulangan. Kaya asahan po natin ang mga ilang power interruptions na una ng naipabatid sa ating OMECO IEC Facebook Page. Maari rin pong magkaroon ng adjustment sa mga oras na nakalagay dito depende sa ating magiging supply. \n\nMarch 23, 2023 \nhttps://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=pfbid0jLpW12EAHVNnUgpdZdig7vTCKYzkysJmqQJJsvweEUBc4KPLWvyAf7ibsbFFC5zdl&id=706339009469417&mibextid=qC1gEa\n\nMarch 24, 2023\nhttps://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=pfbid02yrW3Ezi9dyUctDzEcQgXGqB7jfuAhBUN1bhL5kkXCTBVDxEpHBC5AnP9gX6oUmRjl&id=706339009469417&mibextid=qC1gEa\n\nSalamat po sa inyong pangunawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management"'
b'March 22, 2023 | EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION \n\nDahilan: Correction of Hotspot at Magbay Substation \n\nOras: 7:06 P.M. \n\nMga lugar na apektado:\n\nMunicipal Compound, MHO to Magdalene Hospital, Marsan Village, Portion of Bonifacio St., Lakandula St., Arellano St., ML. Quezon St., and Back of Rusi, Portion of Brgy 6, Brgy. 7, Brgy. 8, Sea Breeze, Brgy. Caminawit, Brgy. Pag-asa, Zapanta Maternity & General Hospital, Seminario Area, Malvar St., Portion of M.H. Del Pillar st., Mabini St., Portion of teachers village and Mabini Extension, Brgy 4, 5, Portion of Brgy. 6; Rizal St. Public Market, Liboro St. (Mula China Bank hanggang Pandurucan), Westmin Hospital and MOMMG Medical Plaza,  From Portion of Brgy. Magbay to Labangan Poblacion and Portion of Teachers Village to Labangan Shell, Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island\n\nMAGSAYSAY\n\nPansamantalang mawawalan ng suplay ng kuryente ang mga lugar na apektado dahil sa biglaang pagsasaayos sa Magbay Substation. Asahan na maibabalik muli ang suplay ng kuryente anumang oras na matapos ang nasabing aktibidad.\n\nMaraming salamat po.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\n\nMagandang araw, Kamay-ari!\n\nPansamantala pong hindi makakakuha ng suplay ng kuryente ang OMECO mula ORMECO sa darating na Sabado at Linggo (March 25-26, 2023) dahil magkakaroon ng taunang pagsasaayos ang National Power Corporation sa mga 69KV substations nito sa Oriental Mindoro.\n\nIsasabay din ng OMECO ang construction ng 69KV line mula Magbay Substation patungong Labangan Substation na magsasaayos sa daloy ng boltahe sa Labangan Feeder.\n\nMagsisimula ang power interruption sa araw ng Sabado at Linggo ng alas-otso ng umaga (8:00). Asahan na maibabalik ang suplay ng kuryente anumang oras na matapos ang naka-schedule na gawain. \nMaglalabas ang OMECO IEC ng regular na update sa nasabing aktibidad. Manatiling bisitahin ang page na ito para sa anumang anunsiyong ilalabas ng pamunuan. \n\nNarito ang mga apektadong lugar:\n\nSAN JOSE \xe2\x80\x93 From Portion of Brgy. Magbay to Labangan Poblacion and Portion of Teachers Village to Labangan Shell, Brgy. Mabini, Mangarin, Mapaya, Ilin and Ambulong Island, Brgy 4, 5, Portion of Brgy. 6; Rizal St. Public Market, Liboro St. (Mula China Bank hanggang Pandurucan), Westmin Hospital and MOMMG Medical Plaza and San Roque 1&2, Old Brgy. Hall San Roque, Airport Road, Municipal Compound, MHO to Magdalene Hospital, Marzan Village, Portion of Bonifacio St., Lakandula St., Arellano St., ML. Quezon St., and Back of Rusi, Portion of Brgy 6, Brgy. 7, Brgy. 8, Sea Breeze, Brgy. Caminawit, Brgy. Pag-asa, Zapanta Maternity & General Hospital, Seminario Area, Malvar St., Portion of M.H. b'March 21, 2023\nThe Central Elementary School invited OMECO Sablayan Branch Office headed by Engr. Jominique Mari U. Ferrer to share knowledge about the transformation of energy for Grade 6 pupils.'
b'P A B A T I D\nMARCH 20, 2023\n\nAno: EMERGENCY POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nKailan: MARCH 20, 2023 SIMULA NG 9:37AM\n\nApektadong Lugar: BUONG MAPSA Area\n\nDahil sa pag taas ng demand ang ating power supply na nanggaling sa ORMECO ay nagkakaroon na rin ng kakulangan. Kaya asahan po natin ang mga ilang power interruptions na una ng naipabatid sa ating OMECO IEC Facebook Page. Maari rin pong magkaroon ng adjustment sa mga oras na nakalagay dito depende sa ating magiging supply. \n\nhttps://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=pfbid0mzuxqHErhQ4CesyFXnPanN1scidB5Efy7TTWqZWH1m6CYu8CcJmLzrjTAs5Vt2zZl&id=706339009469417&mibextid=qC1gEa\n\nSalamat po sa inyong pangunawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nSa mga katanungan tumawag or magtext lamang sa ating mga hotlines:\nGlobe 09166105913\nSmart 09201390462\n\n-OMECO MAPSA Management'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\n\nIpinababatid po sa lahat ng kamay-ari ng OMECO na ngayong buwan ng Marso mag re-reflect sa monthly electric bill ng mga consumer ang pagtaas sa singil ng kuryente na aabot ng PhP 8.4702 per kWh na generation charge dahil sa pagkaantala ng power billing mula Oriental para sa buwan ng January \xe2\x80\x93 February 2023. Ang power billing na ito ay ang halaga ng nabiling kuryente ng OMECO mula Oriental.\n\nMakikita sa Statement of Account (SOA) o billing receipt para sa billing ng Pebrero na bumaba sa PhP 4.4117/kWh ang generation charge kumpara sa billing ng Enero na PhP 6.3511/kWh. Kung kaya\xe2\x80\x99t ang halagang hindi nasingil na generation charge noong February billing ay kukunin ngayong March Billing.\n\nNarito po ang magiging Power Rate para sa March 2023 Billing:\n\nResidential Consumer - PhP 13.9178/kWh\nCommercial Consumer - PhP 11.7600/kWh\nIndustrial Consumer - PhP 12.1010/kWh \nPublic Building \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 11.8489/kWh \nStreet Light \xe2\x80\x93 PhP 14.6201/kWh\nLarge Load - PhP 11.2885/kWh\n\nPara sa inyong mga katanungan, tumawag o mag-text sa 0951-736-8908 at 0966-784-9920.\n\nMaraming salamat po.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2'

b'Pabatid\nMarch 16, 2023\nEmergency Power Interruption\n\nAno: Unscheduled Emergency power interruption sa buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: March 16, 2023 simula 11:12am\n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDahilan: Magkakaroon ng joint meter calibration ang NPC (MINOLO Line) at ERC na inaasahang magtatagal ng hanggang 1:00pm ngayong araw. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

b'March 15, 2023\nOMECO Sablayan Branch Office conducted Symposium at San Vicente National High School for Grade 10 students .\nThis is to strengthen the involvement and concern of its Member-Consumers  as well as those users of electricity.\nThank you very much Madam Suertelita G. Dangeros Principal III and Madam Sevilla D. Daprosa Head Teacher III.'
b'LINEMEN IN ACTION\nMarch 15, 2023\n\nKasabay ng isinasagawang Activities ng National Power Corporation (NPC), ang ating Maintenance Team ay nag sasagawa rin ng Line Clearing and checking of all tapping service entrance near Occidental Mindoro National High School Mamburao upang masigurado ang quality ng kuryente sa gaganaping Civil Service Examination sa March 26, 2023.'
b'Pabatid\nMarch 14, 2023\nSchedule Power Interruption\n\nAno: Schedule power interruption sa buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: March 15, 2023 8:00am to 5:00pm\n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDahilan: Sa mga natanggap na liham ng OMECO galing National Power Corporation (NPC), napagkasunduan na lahat ng activities ng NPC ay isasagawa sa March 15, 2023 kabilang sa mga activities nila ay ang Preventive Maintenance ng NPC Tayamaan Substation at Resagging ng 69KV transmission line sa Abra De Ilog sa ikakaganda at ikakaayos ng ating daluyan ng kuryente. \n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

b"PABATID\n\nUnscheduled Power Interruption\n\nReason: 69KV Line Tripped\nWhen: March 13, 2023\nTime Started: 11:14 AM\n\nAREA'S AFFECTED:\n\nPortion of San Jose\nMagsaysay\nMAPSA AREA\nSABLAYAN AREA\n\nRestoration of power is ongoing."
b'Pabatid\nMarch 11, 2023\nSchedule Power Interruption\n\nAno: Schedule power interruption sa buong MAPSA Area\n\nKailan: March 11, 2023\n\nApektadong Lugar: Buong MAPSA Area\n\nDahilan: Magsasagawa nga Preventive Maintenance (PMS) ang National Power Corporation (NPC) sa ating tinatawag na \xe2\x80\x9cMinolo Line\xe2\x80\x9d na nagkukunekta sa buong MAPSA Area sa ORMECO ngayong araw. At dahil ang supply ng buong MAPSA Area ay galing sa ORMECO asahan ang rotational brownout base sa ating nakatakdang schedule na nauna ng naibahagi na makikita sa link na ito https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=5106818009421473&id=706339009469417&mibextid=qC1gEa\n\nMaraming salamat po sa pang-unawa at Ingat po tayong lahat.\n\nOMECO MAPSA Management'

b'March 2, 2023 | \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\n\nIpinapaalala po sa lahat ng kamay-ari ng OMECO na may gaganaping \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf ngayong taong 2023. Inaanyayahan po ang lahat ng interesadong tumakbo bilang OMECO Board of Director ng Magsaysay, Sta. Cruz, at Abra de Ilog na makilahok sa nasabing aktibidad. Narito po ang mga importanteng petsa tungkol sa District Elections:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 (District III) \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 2, 2023; Deadline of filing: MARCH 23, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae. \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x87 (District VII) \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 2, 2023; Deadline of filing: MARCH 23, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 (District IX) \xe2\x80\x93 Election date: APRIL 2, 2023; Deadline of filing: MARCH 23, 2023\n\nAng talaan ng mga botante (Masterlist) ay naka-paskil sa inyong barangay hall at munisipyo, mangyari lamang na suriin natin ito. Kung sakaling di sinasadyang nawala o di kaya ay mali ang baybay ng inyong pangalan ay kinakailangang gumawa ng request letter na nagsasaad ng inyong pangalan at isumite ito sa MSD office ng OMECO. Ang huling araw ng paghahain ng reklamo para sa nasabing talaan ay sa ika-23 ng Marso (Magsaysay, Sta. Cruz, at Abra de Ilog).\n\nAng hindi paggamit sa takdang panahon para sa pagsasaayos ng talaan ay ipagpapalagay na pagbabaliwala ng kasapi sa kanyang karapatang bumoto ayon sa Article VI, Section 19, ng Electric Cooperative Election Code.\n\nPara sa karagdagang impormasyon, maaari pong pumunta sa opisina ng OMECO o tumawag sa mga sumusunod na hotline numbers:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac: 0951-736-8908 (SMART); 0966-784-9920 (GLOBE)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94. \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xad & \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a: 0920-139-0462 (SMART); 0916-610-5913 (GLOBE)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93'
